original: sems can mya ngan 'das la 'god //🔽ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: sems can mya ngan 'das la 'god // ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: and establish sentient beings in nirvana.

original: de nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid la dbang bskur la rdo rje padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te 'jug pa'i cho gas zhugs te /
analyzed: de nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid la dbang bskur la rdo rje padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te 'jug pa'i cho gas zhugs te /
translated: Then, having empowered oneself with the water of the vase that is outside, one should enter by the rite of entry, having formed the pledge seal of the vajra lotus.

original: de nas rdo rje mna'i chu 'thungs la dbab pa'i cho gas dbab pa byas te /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje mna'i chu 'thungs la dbab pa'i cho gas dbab pa byas te /
translated: Then, having drunk the water of the vajra lotus, one should cause the descent of the wisdom-being by the rite of descent.

original: aom padma spho ta aa dhi tishtha aa zhes bya ba brgya dang yang aa zhes bya ba lan brgya'i bar du bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom padma spho ta aa dhi tishtha aa zhes bya ba brgya dang yang aa zhes bya ba lan brgya'i bar du bzla bar bya'o //
translated: One should repeat the mantra “Oṃ padmasphoṭa adhi tiṣṭha a” one hundred times, and also “a” one hundred times.

original: de nas me tog dor la rang gi spyi bor bcings te /
analyzed: de nas me tog dor la rang gi spyi bor bcings te /
translated: Then, having cast the flower, one should bind it on one’s head.

original: gdong g-yogs bkrol nas dkyil 'khor bltas la /
analyzed: gdong g-yogs bkrol nas dkyil 'khor bltas la /
translated: Having removed the blindfold, one should view the maṇḍala.

original: dbab ba nye bar bsdu ba byas nas //
analyzed: dbab ba nye bar bsdu ba byas nas //
translated: Having performed the descent and the near-accomplishment,

original: slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i cho gas bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
analyzed: slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i cho gas bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
translated: one should empower oneself by the rite of empowerment as the master.

original: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
translated: Having made offerings with all offerings,

original: mig 'byed pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: mig 'byed pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
translated: one should perform the rite of opening the eyes, and so forth.

original: tshigs bcad gnyis kyis rjes su gnang ba mnos nas /
analyzed: tshigs bcad gnyis kyis rjes su gnang ba mnos nas /
translated: Having received the authorization in two verses,

original: de nyid kyis ni padma gzung //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni padma gzung //
translated: one should hold the lotus with that very [mudra].

original: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
analyzed: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
translated: One should ring the Dharma-bell.

original: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher //
analyzed: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher //
translated: One should make the great samaya mudra.

original: de nas byin gyis brlabs te 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying po bzlas la /
analyzed: de nas byin gyis brlabs te 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying po bzlas la /
translated: Then, having blessed [oneself] and recited the essence of Vinayaka,

original: dngos grub kyi padma'i brtul zhu gas blangs te /
analyzed: dngos grub kyi padma'i brtul zhu gas blangs te /
translated: one should take the vow of the lotus of spiritual powers.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying po dang phyag rgya @37b bzhi'i ye shes bslabs nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying po dang phyag rgya @37b bzhi'i ye shes bslabs nas /
translated: Having trained in the knowledge of the essence of Bhagavat Vinayaka and the four mudras,

original: gzengs bstod pa dang / lung bstan pa blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzengs bstod pa dang / lung bstan pa blang bar bya'o //
translated: one should take the encouragement and the prophecy.

original: yang rang la byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phyag rgya dang / cod pan dang / padmo dang / bdag po dang / ming gi dbang bskur bas rang nyid la bdag nyid kyis byas nas /
analyzed: yang rang la byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phyag rgya dang / cod pan dang / padmo dang / bdag po dang / ming gi dbang bskur bas rang nyid la bdag nyid kyis byas nas /
translated: Again, having performed the consecration of oneself, the mudra, the crown, the lotus, the lord, and the empowerment of the name,

original: bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on oneself, having made offerings to oneself.

original: lo ke shva ra aa ham zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ming gang yang rung ba nas brjod de /
analyzed: lo ke shva ra aa ham zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ming gang yang rung ba nas brjod de /
translated: One should recite any suitable name, such as Lokeshvara aham.

original: padma dang dril bu 'dzin pa nyid kyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
analyzed: padma dang dril bu 'dzin pa nyid kyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
translated: Holding a lotus and a bell, one forms the great seal of Vairochana.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su buddha h'um aa zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad kyi padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /🔽de nas badzra padma aa ham zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su buddha h'um aa zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad kyi padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la / de nas badzra padma aa ham zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In the place of Vairochana, with the words “buddha hūṃ a,” one imagines a five-pronged vajra marked with a lotus of Vairochana.🔽Then, with the words “vajra padma aham,” one should cultivate the pride of being a tathāgata.

original: rdo rje de nyid ta dya th'a sarbba ta th'a ga ta satta th'a aa ham zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje de nyid ta dya th'a sarbba ta th'a ga ta satta th'a aa ham zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: With the words “tad yathā sarvatathāgata sitātapatrā aham,” one should cultivate the identity of Vairochana.

original: de bzhin du padma 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la padma 'bebs pa'i gnas su /🔽aom sham mu kha /🔽padma ku m'a ra /🔽be sha dha ra /
analyzed: de bzhin du padma 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la padma 'bebs pa'i gnas su / aom sham mu kha / padma ku m'a ra / be sha dha ra /
translated: In the same way, one forms the great seal of Padmanartteśvara up to the seal of Padmapāṇi. In the place of Padmapāṇi,

original: padma ghanda ya /
analyzed: padma ghanda ya /
translated: one recites “oṃ śaṃmukha padma kumāra viśa dharma padma ghaṇṭā āviśa sarvapadmakula samayaṃ sarva mudraṃ🔽 Translation: Holding a lotus and a bell, one forms the great seal of Vairochana.🔽In the place of Vairochana, with the words “buddha hūṃ a,” one imagines a five-pronged vajra marked with a lotus of Vairochana.🔽Then, with the words “vajra padma aham,” one should cultivate the pride of being a tathāgata.

original: a'a bi sha ya /🔽sarbba padma ku la sa ma y'am /
analyzed: a'a bi sha ya / sarbba padma ku la sa ma y'am /
translated: With the words “tad yathā sarvatathāgata sitātapatrā aham,” one should cultivate the identity of Vairochana.🔽In the same way, one forms the great seal of Padmanartteśvara up to the seal of Padmapāṇi. In the place of Padmapāṇi,

original: sarbba mu dram /
analyzed: sarbba mu dram /
translated: one recites “oṃ śaṃmukha padma kumāra viśa dharma padma ghaṇṭā āviśa sarvapadmakula samayaṃ sarva mudraṃ

original: bandha ya / sarbba siddhi mme pra yatstsha /
analyzed: bandha ya / sarbba siddhi mme pra yatstsha /
translated: sarvasiddhiṃ me prayaccha.🔽 Padmāvabhāsa ā ā ā ā.

original: padma a'a be sha aa aa aa aa zhes bya bas padma 'bebs pa'i gnas su padma dril bu'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: padma a'a be sha aa aa aa aa zhes bya bas padma 'bebs pa'i gnas su padma dril bu'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
translated: By this one should imagine oneself in the place of Padmāveśa in the form of a lotus-bell.🔽Padmaghāṇḍa aham.

original: padma ghanda aa ham zhes bya bas nga rgyal bskyed la /
analyzed: padma ghanda aa ham zhes bya bas nga rgyal bskyed la /
translated: By this one should generate pride.🔽 Padmāvabhāsa aham.

original: padma a'a be sha aa ham zhes bya bas dril bu'i gzugs de padma 'bebs pa'i bar bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: padma a'a be sha aa ham zhes bya bas dril bu'i gzugs de padma 'bebs pa'i bar bsgom par bya'o //
translated: By this one should meditate on that form of the bell as Padmāveśa.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad rdo rjes bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad rdo rjes bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, one should accomplish the entire maṇḍala wheel with the vajra.

original: de nas sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas sgo phye la /
analyzed: de nas sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas sgo phye la /
translated: Then, with the door-opening mudrā, one should open the door,

original: bsdu ba byas te mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
analyzed: bsdu ba byas te mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
translated: gather, and praise with the one hundred and eight names.

original: sgo thams cad nas rta mgrin gyi lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis las byas te /
analyzed: sgo thams cad nas rta mgrin gyi lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis las byas te /
translated: With the action mudrās of Hayagrīva's iron hook, etc., one should perform the rites at all the doors.

original: de bzhin du padma'i gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad la ra ba dang dra ba byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du padma'i gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad la ra ba dang dra ba byas te /
translated: In the same way, with Padma Yakṣa, one should expel obstructors and create the enclosure and net.

original: padma'i khu tshur gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bcad la /
analyzed: padma'i khu tshur gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bcad la /
translated: With the lotus fist, block the doors of the maṇḍala.

original: padma'i bsrung bas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs te /
analyzed: padma'i bsrung bas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs te /
translated: With the lotus protection, protect all the protections.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying pos dkyil 'khor ba'i lha thams cad la mchod yon phul la /🔽aom pra wa ra satk'a ram pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying pos dkyil 'khor ba'i lha thams cad la mchod yon phul la / aom pra wa ra satk'a ram pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
translated: With the essence of taming migrating beings, offer water for the feet to all the maṇḍala deities.🔽With this knowledge, “oṃ pravara satkarma pratīccha svāhā,”

original: zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dis zhabs bsil dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dis zhabs bsil dbul bar bya'o //
translated: offer the water for the feet.

original: phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /🔽g-yas @38a * //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni 'di yin te / g-yas @38a * //
translated: The mudra is as follows:🔽With the right fist,

original: pa'i khu tshur gyis sor mo thams cad bskum la mdzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis bskum pa ltar byas nas me tog blangs te /
analyzed: pa'i khu tshur gyis sor mo thams cad bskum la mdzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis bskum pa ltar byas nas me tog blangs te /
translated: bend all the fingers and make the index finger and the thumb as if bent, and pick up the flower.

original: 'bul ba'i tshe sor mo de rnams brkyang bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'bul ba'i tshe sor mo de rnams brkyang bar bya ste /
translated: When offering, extend those fingers.

original: lha thams cad kyi zhabs la dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: lha thams cad kyi zhabs la dbul bar bya'o //
translated: Offer to the feet of all deities.

original: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Then, form the mudra of the pledge of Vairocana,

original: shuddha h'um dri shya dza: h'um bam ho:/🔽sa ma ya h'um /
analyzed: shuddha h'um dri shya dza: h'um bam ho:/ sa ma ya h'um /
translated: and recite “śuddha hūṃ dṛśya jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ /🔽samaya hūṃ /

original: sa ma ya stvam /
analyzed: sa ma ya stvam /
translated: samaya stvaṃ /

original: aa ham buddha h'um zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod la rnam par snang mdzad bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: aa ham buddha h'um zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod la rnam par snang mdzad bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should accomplish Vairocana by reciting I am Buddha three times.

original: de bzhin du bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: de bzhin du bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Likewise, one should accomplish the Buddhas of the Good Period by binding the pledge seal of the Buddhas of the Good Period,🔽reciting:

original: aom sarbba sam sk'a ra pa ri shuddha dharmma te ga gnas mungga te ma h'a na ya ba ri b'a ri sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom sarbba sam sk'a ra pa ri shuddha dharmma te ga gnas mungga te ma h'a na ya ba ri b'a ri sv'a h'a /
translated: Om, all good, purified phenomena, the nature of space, the great cloud, the great rain, svâhâ.

original: dri shya dza: h'um bam ho:/🔽sa ma ya h'um /
analyzed: dri shya dza: h'um bam ho:/ sa ma ya h'um /
translated: Drisya, jaḥ, hūṃ, vaṃ, hoḥ.🔽Samaya, hūṃ.

original: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
analyzed: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
translated: Samaya stvam, aham.

original: aom sarbba sam sk'a ra pa ri shuddha dharmma te ga na sa mungga te ma h'a na ya ba ri bla re sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom sarbba sam sk'a ra pa ri shuddha dharmma te ga na sa mungga te ma h'a na ya ba ri bla re sv'a h'a /
translated: Om, all good, purified phenomena, the nature of space, the great cloud, the great rain, the canopy, svâhâ.

original: zhes brjod cing bskal pa bzang po rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod cing bskal pa bzang po rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should accomplish the Buddhas of the Good Period by reciting this.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
translated: One should accomplish Vairocana, etc.,

original: padma 'bebs pa'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po pa rnams kyi g-yon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur bkan la g-yas pa'i mdzub mo dang ma the bong gnyis kyis mthe'u chung nas brtsams te phye la /
analyzed: padma 'bebs pa'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po pa rnams kyi g-yon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur bkan la g-yas pa'i mdzub mo dang ma the bong gnyis kyis mthe'u chung nas brtsams te phye la /
translated: The mudra of the good kalpa bodhisattvas such as Maitreya and so forth is to reverse the Tathagata fist of the left hand and with the right hand the index and thumb fingers should open the little finger and so forth.

original: thal mo khong stong du byas pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: thal mo khong stong du byas pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The hollow space of the palms is the commitment seal.

original: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bsgrubs nas /
analyzed: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bsgrubs nas /
translated: Thus, having accomplished Vairochana and so forth with the commitment seals,

original: chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis kyang rgyas btab nas //
analyzed: chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis kyang rgyas btab nas //
translated: they are also sealed with the Dharma, action, and great seals.

original: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur la mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur la mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
translated: Having conferred empowerment with the empowerment seals, one should make offerings to them with all offerings preceded by a welcoming water offering.

original: gos dang rgyan thams cad la gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / bla re sna tshogs pa la yang padma gnod sbyin dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba dang / yi ge aom mngon par bzlas te dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: gos dang rgyan thams cad la gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / bla re sna tshogs pa la yang padma gnod sbyin dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba dang / yi ge aom mngon par bzlas te dbul bar bya'o //
translated: All the clothes and ornaments, and also the various parasols, victory banners, and canopies, are consecrated with the mantra of Padmanartaka, and the mantra of Lokeshvara.

original: de nas me tog gi shing brgya'am bzhi'am me tog gi shing rnams la me tog gi rig pa dang / de nas mar me'i rig pas mar me dang / dri'i rig pas dri dang / bdug pa'i rig pas bdug pa dang / aa k'a ro mu kham zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i lha bshos kyi rig pa dang /
analyzed: de nas me tog gi shing brgya'am bzhi'am me tog gi shing rnams la me tog gi rig pa dang / de nas mar me'i rig pas mar me dang / dri'i rig pas dri dang / bdug pa'i rig pas bdug pa dang / aa k'a ro mu kham zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i lha bshos kyi rig pa dang /
translated: Then, one hundred flower trees, or four, are consecrated with the mantra of the flower tree, and then the lamps with the mantra of the lamp, the scents with the mantra of the scent, the incense with the mantra of the incense, and the food with the mantra of the food, such as the one beginning with akaro mukha.

original: rol mo'i cha byad thams cad la rol me'i rig pa rnams dang / dar dpyangs dpyangs par @38b bya ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga yab kyis brgyan cing /
analyzed: rol mo'i cha byad thams cad la rol me'i rig pa rnams dang / dar dpyangs dpyangs par @38b bya ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga yab kyis brgyan cing /
translated: All the musical instruments are consecrated with the mantra of the musical instrument, and they are hung with silk ribbons, flower garlands, and yak-tail fans.

original: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas spras pa /
analyzed: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas spras pa /
translated: They are adorned with nets and half-nets.

original: zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes par byas pa dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / ba glang gi khyu shin tu brtags pa rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o //🔽rta babs yid du 'ong ba dril bu la sogs pa dang bcas pa la yang /
analyzed: zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes par byas pa dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / ba glang gi khyu shin tu brtags pa rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o // rta babs yid du 'ong ba dril bu la sogs pa dang bcas pa la yang /
translated: and a half-moon, and also a very well-bred herd of horses, elephants, and bulls.🔽On the beautiful archways, together with the bells, etc.,

original: padma'i gnod sbyin dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba dang / yi ge aom mngon par bzlas te dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: padma'i gnod sbyin dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba dang / yi ge aom mngon par bzlas te dbul bar bya'o //
translated: one should offer the yakṣa of the lotus, the discipliner of beings, and the syllable OṂ, all of which are consecrated.

original: de la mchod pa thams cad dbul ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te /🔽badzra sva ra na kham de nas padmo'i sgeg mo /
analyzed: de la mchod pa thams cad dbul ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te / badzra sva ra na kham de nas padmo'i sgeg mo /
translated: The essence of the offering of all offerings is this:🔽vajra svāhā

original: la sogs pa rnam pa brgyad kyis mchod la /
analyzed: la sogs pa rnam pa brgyad kyis mchod la /
translated: Then, having made offerings with the eight goddesses beginning with Padma Lāsyā,

original: padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa bcu drug gi kyang dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa bcu drug gi kyang dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par mchod de /
translated: and also with the sixteen offerings explained in the Padma Karma maṇḍala, one should make offerings to all the maṇḍalas.

original: yi ge aom mngon par bzlas pa'i rin po che sna bdun dang / mchod pa'i yan lag thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad gang bar bsams la /
analyzed: yi ge aom mngon par bzlas pa'i rin po che sna bdun dang / mchod pa'i yan lag thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad gang bar bsams la /
translated: Having recited the syllable Oṃ, one should imagine that the sky is filled with the seven precious substances and all the branches of worship.

original: aom sarbba bitp'u ra p'ur su ra su ra a'a wa rta ya a'a wa rta ya ho: aom badzra spha ra na kham zhes bya ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar ba bcings la yang mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: aom sarbba bitp'u ra p'ur su ra su ra a'a wa rta ya a'a wa rta ya ho: aom badzra spha ra na kham zhes bya ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar ba bcings la yang mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should worship with the mantra Oṃ sarva-vit-pūra pūra sura sura āvartaya āvartaya hoḥ / Oṃ vajra-sphuraṇa khaṃ, and with the gesture of homage.

original: slar yang padma'i sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhis dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par mchod la /🔽phyag byas te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das dngos grub thams cad kyi phyir /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kun du rab grub phyir //

analyzed: slob ma rdo rje thal mo bskor ba dang / slob dpon la phyag byed du bcug la /

analyzed: slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa rnams kyis khyad par brjod par bya ste /

analyzed: shar phyogs kyi sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'i dkyil 'khor tshon sna lngas bris la / de'i dbus su padma @43a * //

analyzed: de'i steng du rdo rje padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa bris la /

analyzed: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du dkyil 'khor de yang dag par mchod nas /

analyzed: de la seng ge'i khri'am /

original: khri'u padma dang / zla ba dar gyis g-yogs la /
analyzed: khri'u padma dang / zla ba dar gyis g-yogs la /

original: padma'i gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas te slob ma bzhag la /
analyzed: padma'i gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas te slob ma bzhag la /
translated: Recite the essence mantra of Lokeshvara and place the disciple on it.

original: de'i steng du bla re bre ba dang / g-yas logs su dar dang / me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i gdugs dkar po rin po che'i tog can bya'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du bla re bre ba dang / g-yas logs su dar dang / me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i gdugs dkar po rin po che'i tog can bya'o //
translated: Above him, put up a canopy, and to his right, a white parasol adorned with silk and flower garlands and having a jewel top.🔽To his left, plant a victory banner and various flags made of white cloth.

analyzed: de nas slob ma 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs su bskyed la /

original: de phyag rgya chen po gnas pa la /
analyzed: de phyag rgya chen po gnas pa la /

translated: In the disciples' bodies, in the places explained in the Great Yoga Tantra, the pledge seals are arrayed as all the special deities of the mandala, beginning with Vairochana and Lokeshvara and ending with Padmadhara.

original: yang de nyid la yi ge ma las rnam par snang mdzad kyi cod pan dang / yi ge nga las brang du mi bskyod pa'i dpal be'u dang / yi ge nya las smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur rin chen 'byung ldan dang / yi ge na las mchu gnyis kyi bar du 'od dpag tu med pa dang /
analyzed: yang de nyid la yi ge ma las rnam par snang mdzad kyi cod pan dang / yi ge nga las brang du mi bskyod pa'i dpal be'u dang / yi ge nya las smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur rin chen 'byung ldan dang / yi ge na las mchu gnyis kyi bar du 'od dpag tu med pa dang /
translated: Again, from the letter ma is the diadem of Vairochana, from the letter nga is the endless knot of Akshobhya on the chest, from the letter nya is Ratnasambhava at the point between the eyebrows, from the letter na is Amitabha between the two lips,

original: yi ge na las spyi gtsug tu don yod grub pa dang / yi ge ya las snying gar padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje dang / yi ge ra las dpral bar padmas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu gtsang ma zhes bya ba dang / yi ge la las lkog ma'i phyogs su rdo rje padma dang /

translated: from the syllable la, a vajra lotus is in the throat,🔽from the syllable va, a variegated lotus is in the head,🔽and from the syllables a a, the lotus buddha and the lotus king are in the right and left ears,

original: yi ge wa las mgo bor sna tshogs padma dang / aa a'a zhes bya bas rna ba g-yas g-yon du padma'i sangs rgyas dang / padma'i rgyal po dang / ai a'i las mig g-yas g-yon gnyis su padma'i chags pa dang / padma'i legs pa dang /
analyzed: yi ge wa las mgo bor sna tshogs padma dang / aa a'a zhes bya bas rna ba g-yas g-yon du padma'i sangs rgyas dang / padma'i rgyal po dang / ai a'i las mig g-yas g-yon gnyis su padma'i chags pa dang / padma'i legs pa dang /
translated: from the syllables i ī, the lotus passion and the lotus excellence are in the right and left eyes,

original: au a'u zhes bya ba las 'gram pa gnyis su padma'i khro gnyer dang padma'i nyi ma /
analyzed: au a'u zhes bya ba las 'gram pa gnyis su padma'i khro gnyer dang padma'i nyi ma /
translated: from the syllables u ū, the lotus frown and the lotus sun are in the two cheeks,

original: ri r'i zhes bya ba las rna rtsa gnyis su padma'i dpal dang / padma'i bzhad pa /
analyzed: ri r'i zhes bya ba las rna rtsa gnyis su padma'i dpal dang / padma'i bzhad pa /
translated: from the syllables ri ṛi, the lotus glory and the lotus laughter are in the two ear canals,🔽and from the syllables li ḷi, the lotus splendor and the lotus luster are in the two nostrils.

original: li l'i zhes bya ba las mchu gnyis la padma'i sgrol ma dang padma'i rnon bo /
analyzed: li l'i zhes bya ba las mchu gnyis la padma'i sgrol ma dang padma'i rnon bo /

analyzed: ae aee zhes bya @43b ba las sna bug gnyis la padma'i rgyu dang padma'i bsrung ba'o //

analyzed: lcags sgrog dang / 'bebs pa'o //

analyzed: tri ka kha ga gha zhes bya ba las rgyab tu rig pa'i rgyal po rnams so //

analyzed: ta tha da dha zhes bya ba las dpung pa gnyis dang lhag pa gnyis la khro bo rnams so //

analyzed: ta tha da dha zhes bya ba las rtags dang mjug tshos gnyis dang rgyab tu tshogs kyi bdag po rnams so //

analyzed: pa pha pa bha zhes bya ba las brla gnyis dang rje ngar gnyis la pho nya rnams so //

analyzed: sha lam ku ka zhes bya ba las rkang pa'i long bu gnyis su g-yog po rnams so //

analyzed: kram kri ya ra la wa ksha zhes bya ba las rkang pa g-yas pa la las byed ma bdun no //

analyzed: sha sha sa ha lam zhes bya ba las rkang pa g-yon pa la ming po gsum dang / sring mo bzhi dang bcas pa dgod par bya'o //

original: sngar yig 'bru rnams rim gyis bkod la ;

analyzed: dngos grub thams cad rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: rigs rigs su yang rgyas pa la mngon par dga' bas yig 'bru dgod pa'i cho ga bya'o //

analyzed: de nas rdo rje chos mas slob ma'i snying gar byin gyis brlabs la /

analyzed: smin mtshams dang / lkog ma dang spyi bor rdo rje dang padma 'ba' zhig dang / sna tshogs padma gsum gyis ji lta ba'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: At the brow, throat, and crown, she should bless the three places with vajra, lotus, and varada, respectively.

original: dri la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod la /
analyzed: dri la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod la /

analyzed: sngar bshad pa bzhin du chos kyi rdo rje bcings te //

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang phan yon bstan pas sgrub pa po spro ba bskyed par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang phan yon bstan pas sgrub pa po spro ba bskyed par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to generate enthusiasm in the practitioner by teaching the benefits of the practice,

original: de gnyis ka bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de gnyis ka bstan pa ni /
translated: both of those are taught.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni dngos grub kyi ye shes bstan pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni dngos grub kyi ye shes bstan pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: Then means after the teaching of the gnosis of power.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
translated: The great maṇḍala is the great maṇḍala of the Tamer of Migrating Beings.

original: thams cad kyang yin la phyag rgya yang de yin pas na thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: thams cad kyang yin la phyag rgya yang de yin pas na thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: Since it is all and it is also a seal, it is the seal of all.

original: phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig @48b dang ; chos dang / las rnams kyi der nges pa'i ye shes de bslab cing bstan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig @48b dang ; chos dang / las rnams kyi der nges pa'i ye shes de bslab cing bstan par bya ba'o //
translated: The gnosis that is ascertained there of the great seal, pledge seal, doctrine seal, and action seal should be taught and trained in.

original: de la zhes bya ba smos pa ni rgyas par 'chad pa'o //🔽re zhig ces smos pa ni rim pa la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba smos pa ni rgyas par 'chad pa'o // re zhig ces smos pa ni rim pa la ltos pa'o //
translated: The statement “there” is an extensive explanation.🔽The statement “first” is in reference to the sequence.

original: dang por zhes bya ba ni thog mar ro //
analyzed: dang por zhes bya ba ni thog mar ro //
translated: First means initially.

original: phyag rgya yang yin la chen po yang de yin pas /
analyzed: phyag rgya yang yin la chen po yang de yin pas /
translated: It is a seal and it is great,🔽

original: phyag rgya chen pos te /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen pos te /
translated: It is a seal and it is great, thus it is a great seal.

original: sku'i gsang ba'i ngo bo ye shes su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sku'i gsang ba'i ngo bo ye shes su gyur pa'o //
translated: The essence of the secret of the body is transformed into intuition.

original: ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni //
analyzed: ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni //
translated: In the manner of a picture,

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing //
translated: in the center of a moon-disk,

original: padmo la gnas sems dpa' ni //
analyzed: padmo la gnas sems dpa' ni //
translated: the hero who is situated on a lotus

original: bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid bsgom //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid bsgom // zhes bya ba la /
translated: visualizes himself as himself.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing //🔽zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas la ji ltar ri mo bri bar bstan pa de bzhin du de dag gis rjes su 'brang bar bya ba yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing // zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas la ji ltar ri mo bri bar bstan pa de bzhin du de dag gis rjes su 'brang bar bya ba yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: In the center of a moon-disk🔽means that, in the center of a moon-disk, one is situated in the manner of a picture.

original: ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni //
analyzed: ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni //
translated: In the manner of a picture means that, just as one is taught to draw a picture, one should follow that procedure.

original: padmo la ngas sems dpar ni //🔽bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid bsgom //
analyzed: padmo la ngas sems dpar ni // bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid bsgom //
translated: The hero who is situated on a lotus🔽visualizes himself as himself

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: means that one visualizes oneself as oneself.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: mnyam pa'i thal mo dang / yang rdo rje thal mo dang / de nas rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
analyzed: mnyam pa'i thal mo dang / yang rdo rje thal mo dang / de nas rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
translated: One should first make the gesture of supplication, then the vajra-palms, then bind the vajra-bond,

original: de'i rjes la rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dral te /
analyzed: de'i rjes la rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dral te /
translated: After that, one should open the vajra fist at the heart.

original: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab par byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab par byas la /
translated: One should cause oneself to descend with the pledge seal of Vajrapani.

original: tishtha badzra zhes bya la sogs pas dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba byas nas /
analyzed: tishtha badzra zhes bya la sogs pas dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba byas nas /
translated: Having performed the descent with the words “tiṣṭha vajra,” etc.,

original: badzra mushti zhes bya bas /
analyzed: badzra mushti zhes bya bas /
translated: with the words “vajra muṣṭi”

original: rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /🔽aom badzra sindhi bam /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la / aom badzra sindhi bam /
translated: one should form the pledge seal of the vajra fist as taught in the Vajra Realm Tantra.

original: zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should recite “oṃ vajra sindura vaṃ.”

original: de nas sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya bcings la sdig pa dral lo //
analyzed: de nas sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya bcings la sdig pa dral lo //
translated: Then, having formed the seal for extracting evil, one should extract the evil.

original: de nas skyil mo krung bcas te /
analyzed: de nas skyil mo krung bcas te /
translated: Then, having sat cross-legged,

original: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba rdo rje padmas mtshan pa'i steng du /
analyzed: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba rdo rje padmas mtshan pa'i steng du /
translated: on top of the moon and vajra marked with a lotus at one’s heart,

original: aom h'um hr'i: ho: zhes bya ba yid kyis bris la 'di nyid rgyun du brjod cing chos bdag med pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: aom h'um hr'i: ho: zhes bya ba yid kyis bris la 'di nyid rgyun du brjod cing chos bdag med pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should mentally write oṃ hūṃ hrīḥ hoḥ. Reciting this continuously, one should meditate on the selflessness of phenomena.

original: de nas de nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par rang gi bsams la /
analyzed: de nas de nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par rang gi bsams la /
translated: Then, having visualized that very [syllable] in the form of a moon disc,

original: de'i steng du de nyid dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du de nyid dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'o //
translated: On top of that, there is a second moon maṇḍala.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de nyid la sngar bshad pa'i yi ge bzhi dang ldan pa las padma r'a ga'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de nyid la sngar bshad pa'i yi ge bzhi dang ldan pa las padma r'a ga'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
translated: From that second moon maṇḍala, the four syllables explained previously are transformed into a five-pronged vajra, the color of a ruby.

original: de nyid kyi snying po zlos shing rdo rje las byung ba'i padma de'i dbus su snying po'i yi ge bkod la /
analyzed: de nyid kyi snying po zlos shing rdo rje las byung ba'i padma de'i dbus su snying po'i yi ge bkod la /
translated: Reciting its essence mantra, in the center of that lotus arisen from the vajra, one should arrange the syllables of the essence mantra.

original: badzra padma aa ham zhes padma'i nga rgyal bsgoms te badzra sa tva ham zhes yid kyis brjod @49a * //
analyzed: badzra padma aa ham zhes padma'i nga rgyal bsgoms te badzra sa tva ham zhes yid kyis brjod @49a * //
translated: Cultivating the pride of the lotus through vajra padma aham, one should mentally recite vajra sattva aham.

original: bas ; de padma'i sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i sbyor bas g-yon pa bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor ba'i sems dpar bdag nyid bsgoms la /
analyzed: bas ; de padma'i sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i sbyor bas g-yon pa bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor ba'i sems dpar bdag nyid bsgoms la /
translated: Through the yoga of blessing the lotus being, one should meditate on oneself as the vajra-wielding being, with the left leg extended and the right drawn in.

original: yang badzra satva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: yang badzra satva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Again, one should recite vajra sattva aham.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid la /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid la /
translated: That very vajra being

original: aom h'um hr'i: ho:/
analyzed: aom h'um hr'i: ho:/
translated: is transformed through oṃ hūṃ hrīḥ ha hoḥ.

original: zhes brjod pas bdag nyid 'gro ba 'dul bar nges par byas la /
analyzed: zhes brjod pas bdag nyid 'gro ba 'dul bar nges par byas la /
translated: Having ascertained oneself as the tamer of beings,

original: ma h'a sa ma ya satva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: ma h'a sa ma ya satva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should say, “Mahāsamayasattva I am.”

original: de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Then, having formed the pledge seal of the Tamer of Haughty Spirits,

original: sa ma ya ham zhes brjod do //
analyzed: sa ma ya ham zhes brjod do //
translated: one should say, “Samaya I am.”

original: de nyid dang sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes bya bas snying ga dang / mdzod spu dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid dang sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes bya bas snying ga dang / mdzod spu dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: With that very [seal] and with “Samayasattva adhiṣṭhite svam,” one should consecrate the heart, the ūrṇā, the throat, and the head.

original: de nas padma blangs la /
analyzed: de nas padma blangs la /
translated: Then, having taken up the lotus,

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya ste /
translated: one should form the great seal of the Tamer of Haughty Spirits.

original: de bzhin du padma 'bebs pa'i mthar thug ge bar du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du padma 'bebs pa'i mthar thug ge bar du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should perform all the rites up to the end of the descent of the lotus.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba las bshad pa'i cho gas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la gnas pa'i padmar /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba las bshad pa'i cho gas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la gnas pa'i padmar /
translated: By the rite explained in the Tamer of Haughty Spirits, on the lotus in one’s heart,🔽one should visualize the syllable oṃ.🔽Then, having formed the pledge seal of the Tamer of Haughty Spirits,🔽one should recite the essence mantra of the Tamer of Haughty Spirits:

original: aom sham mu kha /
analyzed: aom sham mu kha /
translated: “Oṃ śamukh

original: padma ku m'a ra /
analyzed: padma ku m'a ra /
translated: padmakumāra

original: be sha dha ra /
analyzed: be sha dha ra /
translated: veśadhāra

original: padma ghanda ya /
analyzed: padma ghanda ya /
translated: padmaghaṇṭaya

original: a'a bi sha ya /
analyzed: a'a bi sha ya /
translated: āviśaya

original: sarbba ku la padma sa ma y'am /
analyzed: sarbba ku la padma sa ma y'am /
translated: sarvakulapadmasamayaṃ

original: sarbba mu dram /
analyzed: sarbba mu dram /
translated: sarvamudram

original: bandha ya / sarbba siddhi mme pva yatstsha /
analyzed: bandha ya / sarbba siddhi mme pva yatstsha /
translated: sarvasiddhim me prayaccha🔽padmāveśa ā ā ā ā ā.

original: padma a'a be sha aa aa aa aa aa zhes yid kyis bris la /
analyzed: padma a'a be sha aa aa aa aa aa zhes yid kyis bris la /
translated: Having mentally written this,

original: de nyid yid kyis brjod cing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o ;
analyzed: de nyid yid kyis brjod cing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o ;
translated: one should mentally recite it and meditate on all phenomena as selfless.

original: / de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: / de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsams la /
translated: Then, having visualized the form of a moon disc,

original: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa sngags de nyid dang bcas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa sngags de nyid dang bcas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
translated: on top of that, a second moon disc with the mantra itself is a five-pronged vajra.

original: padma 'bebs pa'i sngags de nyid dang bcas pas padma'i dril bur bskyed la /🔽dril bu'i dbus su padma 'bebs pa'i sngags bsams la badzra ghanda ham zhes bya bas padma dril bu'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: padma 'bebs pa'i sngags de nyid dang bcas pas padma'i dril bur bskyed la / dril bu'i dbus su padma 'bebs pa'i sngags bsams la badzra ghanda ham zhes bya bas padma dril bu'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
translated: With the mantra of Padmanarteshvara, one should generate the lotus bell.🔽In the center of the bell, one should visualize the mantra of Padmanarteshvara. With vajra-ghantā-haṃ, one should meditate on the pride of the lotus bell.

original: badzra satva zhes brjod pas padma'i dril bu de rdo rje sems dpar bsams la /
analyzed: badzra satva zhes brjod pas padma'i dril bu de rdo rje sems dpar bsams la /
translated: By reciting vajra-sattva, one should visualize that lotus bell as Vajrasattva.

original: snga ma bzhin du badzra satva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du badzra satva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: As before, one should recite vajra-sattva-haṃ.

original: de nas de la padma 'bebs pa'i sngags brjod pas rdo rje sems dpa' dang padma 'bebs par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de la padma 'bebs pa'i sngags brjod pas rdo rje sems dpa' dang padma 'bebs par bsam par bya'o //
translated: Then, by reciting the Padmanartteśvara mantra, one should imagine Vajrasattva and Padmanartteśvara.

original: de nas ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa ham /
analyzed: de nas ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa ham /
translated: Then, with “Mahāsattvâham,”

original: de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste sa ma ya ham /
analyzed: de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste sa ma ya ham /
translated: one should form the pledge seal and say, “Samayaham.”

original: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / sa ma ya satvam aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes bya bas snying ga dang / smin mtshams dang / lkog @49b ma dang / spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / sa ma ya satvam aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes bya bas snying ga dang / smin mtshams dang / lkog @49b ma dang / spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: Then, with that very pledge seal and “Samayasattvâdhisthāna svāhā,” one should bless the heart, the point between the eyebrows, the throat, and the head.

original: de nas padma'i dril bu bzung la /
analyzed: de nas padma'i dril bu bzung la /
translated: Then, holding the lotus bell,

original: padma 'bebs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dug la /
analyzed: padma 'bebs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dug la /
translated: one should sit in the form of Padmanartteśvara,

original: de'i sngags kyang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i sngags kyang brjod par bya'o //
translated: and recite his mantra.

original: mdun du 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bskyed de pa sgom pa dang / bcing ba yang 'dis bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: mdun du 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bskyed de pa sgom pa dang / bcing ba yang 'dis bshad pa yin no //
translated: In front, one should generate the great seal of Trailokyavijaya and so on, and explain the meditation and binding with this [mantra].

original: de nas mdun du ye shes sems dpa' ji lta ba bzhin du dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te /
analyzed: de nas mdun du ye shes sems dpa' ji lta ba bzhin du dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te /
translated: Then, in front, one should summon, induct, bind, and control the gnosis being just as before.

original: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bltas la yang rang gi lus la dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te /
analyzed: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bltas la yang rang gi lus la dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te /
translated: Looking with one's pledge seal, one should summon, induct, bind, and control it in one's own body.

original: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod cing /
analyzed: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod cing /
translated: Saying samaya stvaṃ,

original: rgyab tu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor phab la /
analyzed: rgyab tu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor phab la /
translated: one should lower the moon maṇḍala to one's back.

original: sa ma ya stvam aa ham zhes bya bas rang gi sngags brjod cing de dang de'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sa ma ya stvam aa ham zhes bya bas rang gi sngags brjod cing de dang de'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Saying samaya stvaṃ aham, one should recite one's mantra and meditate on oneself as having the nature of that.

original: de nas dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod cing yid kyis legs so zhes sbyor ba yis /
analyzed: de nas dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod cing yid kyis legs so zhes sbyor ba yis /
translated: Then, saying jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ, one should mentally say “excellent” with the mind.

original: rang gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcug la /
analyzed: rang gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcug la /
translated: Having caused all tathāgatas to enter one’s body,

original: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: one should accomplish them with one’s pledge seals.

original: de nas rang 'dod pa'i lha de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la /🔽byin gyis rlob pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs te ;
analyzed: de nas rang 'dod pa'i lha de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la / byin gyis rlob pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs te ;
translated: Then, seal all the transcendent ones, who are the deity you desire, with the Dharma, action, and great seal.🔽Empower them with the empowering seals.

original: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur la /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur la /
translated: Empower them with the empowering seals.

original: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang pa'i mchod pa bzhis yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang pa'i mchod pa bzhis yang dag par mchod la /
translated: Then, make offerings with the four secret offerings of the goddess of charm and so forth.

original: phyag byas te dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blang bar byas te /
analyzed: phyag byas te dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blang bar byas te /
translated: Then, bow down and take the spiritual powers and the vajra conduct.

original: de nyid kyis ni padma gzung //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni padma gzung //
translated: With that, hold the lotus.

original: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //🔽dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
analyzed: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya // dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
translated: Ring the Dharma bell.🔽Having blessed the great seal with the pledge,

original: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
translated: recite the essence mantra.

original: bsgom zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bsgom zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: This is called “meditation.”

original: phyag rgya chen po thams cad kyi spyi'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po thams cad kyi spyi'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: This is the general ritual of the practice of all the great seals.

original: de nas de dag gi las ni 'di dag yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: de nas de dag gi las ni 'di dag yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
translated: Then, “these are their activities” refers to Vairocana and so forth.

original: padma 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi dngos grub kyi 'bras bu ni de'i las so //
analyzed: padma 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi dngos grub kyi 'bras bu ni de'i las so //
translated: The result of the power of the great seal of Avalokiteśvara up to Padma-avatara is its action.

original: sangs rgyas phyag rgya che bcings na //
analyzed: sangs rgyas phyag rgya che bcings na //
translated: Having bound the great seal of the Buddha,

original: tshe dpag med dang mnyam par 'gyur //
analyzed: tshe dpag med dang mnyam par 'gyur //
translated: one becomes equal to Amitāyus.

original: zhes bya ba smos pa ni /🔽'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i sngags kyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya @50a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos pa ni / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i sngags kyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya @50a * //
translated: This is stated.

original: chen por bcings nas /
analyzed: chen por bcings nas /
translated: Having bound the great seal of Vairocana with the mantra explained in the Maṇḍala of Subjugation of the World,

original: gang gi tshe snga ma bzhin du byas pas 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe tshe dpag tu med pa dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe snga ma bzhin du byas pas 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe tshe dpag tu med pa dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa 'gyur ro //
translated: when one accomplishes it as before, then one becomes equal to and the same as Amitāyus.

original: rdo rje padmo bcings na ni //
analyzed: rdo rje padmo bcings na ni //
translated: If one binds the vajra lotus,

original: spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur //
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur //
translated: one becomes equal to Avalokiteśvara.🔽This is stated.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems ma'i gnas kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni rdo rje padma'i yin la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems ma'i gnas kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni rdo rje padma'i yin la /
translated: The seal that is in the place of Vajrarati is the vajra lotus.

original: de'i phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas padma'i gzugs so //
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas padma'i gzugs so //
translated: The great seal of that is the form of the Buddha lotus.

original: gang gi tshe de bcings pas 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe sangs rgyas padma dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe de bcings pas 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe sangs rgyas padma dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: When one is bound by that, one is accomplished, and then one is like a buddha lotus.

original: sangs rgyas dbang ni rdo rje rin chen ma'i gnas kyis te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dbang ni rdo rje rin chen ma'i gnas kyis te /
translated: The consecration of the buddhas is the abode of Vajraratna.

original: padma khro gnyer gyi phyag rgya nyid de'i phyag rgya chen po yin la /
analyzed: padma khro gnyer gyi phyag rgya nyid de'i phyag rgya chen po yin la /
translated: The lotus frown mudra is the great mudra of that deity.

original: de bcings nas gang gi tshe bsgoms nas 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bde bar gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa des dbang bskur bas de bzhin gshegs pa dang padma khro gnyer dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bcings nas gang gi tshe bsgoms nas 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bde bar gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa des dbang bskur bas de bzhin gshegs pa dang padma khro gnyer dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: When one is bound by that, and when one is accomplished by meditating on that, then the sugata, the tathagata, is consecrated by that, and one is like the tathagata lotus frown.🔽This is the meaning.

original: padmos padma'i ting 'dzin thob //
analyzed: padmos padma'i ting 'dzin thob //
translated: The lotus attains the lotus samadhi.

original: ces bya ba ni rdo rje chos ma'i gnas te /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rdo rje chos ma'i gnas te /
translated: This is the abode of Vajradharma.

original: padma'i sgrol ma'i phyag rgya chen po nyid de'i phyag rgya chen po yin te /
analyzed: padma'i sgrol ma'i phyag rgya chen po nyid de'i phyag rgya chen po yin te /
translated: The great mudra of lotus Tara is the great mudra of that deity.

original: gang gi tshe de bsgoms pas 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de bsgoms pas 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: When one is accomplished by meditating on that,

original: de'i sgrub pa po la padma sgrol ma'i ting nge 'dzin ster ro //
analyzed: de'i sgrub pa po la padma sgrol ma'i ting nge 'dzin ster ro //
translated: He bestows upon the practitioner the meditative absorption of Padma Lochanā.🔽The supreme variety of the variety is the great seal of Padma Heruka, which is the great seal of Padma Lotus Heruka.

original: sna tshogs kyis ni sna tshogs mchog / ces bya ba ni rdo rje pas ma'i gnas kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po nyid yin pas de'i phyag rgya chen po de bcings nas /
analyzed: sna tshogs kyis ni sna tshogs mchog / ces bya ba ni rdo rje pas ma'i gnas kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po nyid yin pas de'i phyag rgya chen po de bcings nas /
translated: Having bound that great seal of his,

original: gang gis bsgoms pas 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gis bsgoms pas 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: at the time of meditating on it,

original: des sgrub pa po la padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gzugs sna tshogs kyi mchog de ster bar 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: des sgrub pa po la padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gzugs sna tshogs kyi mchog de ster bar 'gyur ro ;
translated: he bestows upon the practitioner the supreme variety of the form of Padma Heruka.

original: / sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: / sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'dul ba'o //
translated: The variety of forms is the taming.

original: zhes bya ba ni gzugs thams cad stan nas gdul bya'i 'gro ba rnams la sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po ster ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gzugs thams cad stan nas gdul bya'i 'gro ba rnams la sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po ster ba'o //
translated: Having manifested all forms, he bestows the great seal of the taming of migrating beings, the variety of forms that tame migrating beings.

original: sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur te //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur te //
translated: The buddha bestows the consecration of the jewel.

original: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thor tshugs kyi phyag rgya chen po ni sangs rgyas rin chen te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thor tshugs kyi phyag rgya chen po ni sangs rgyas rin chen te /
translated: This is the great seal of the Buddha-jatā, the Buddha-jewel.

original: de'i dngos grub kyi dbang bskur ba sgrub pa po la ster bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i dngos grub kyi dbang bskur ba sgrub pa po la ster bar 'gyur te /
translated: The consecration of its power is bestowed on the adept.

original: thor tshugs sangs rgyas nyid ster ro //
analyzed: thor tshugs sangs rgyas nyid ster ro //
translated: The jatā bestows Buddhahood itself.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the verse.

original: padma'i sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya chen po ste /
analyzed: padma'i sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya chen po ste /
translated: The padma-sattva-samādhi is the great seal of the lotus samādhi.

original: padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos @50b grub ster ba'o //
analyzed: padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos @50b grub ster ba'o //
translated: It bestows the power of the lotus samādhi.

original: padma'i khro bo dbang phyug dpal //
analyzed: padma'i khro bo dbang phyug dpal //
translated: The padma-krodheśvara-śrī

original: zhes bya ba ni padma'i don yod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni padma'i don yod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
translated: is the great seal of the lotus Amoghasiddhi.

original: padma khro bo'i dbang phyug de nyid kyi phun sum tshogs pa ni dpal de 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: padma khro bo'i dbang phyug de nyid kyi phun sum tshogs pa ni dpal de 'dod par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of that very padma-krodheśvara is the glory that one should desire.

original: ji ltar dpal de 'dod par bya ba yin zhe na /🔽rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gis //
analyzed: ji ltar dpal de 'dod par bya ba yin zhe na / rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gis //
translated: How should one desire that glory?🔽The vajra-lokeśvara

original: padmo 'dod pa'i dngos grub mchog //
analyzed: padmo 'dod pa'i dngos grub mchog //
translated: is the supreme power of the desired lotus.

original: ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ces bya ba smos te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug ni rdo rje chos so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug ni rdo rje chos so //
translated: Vajra Lokeśvara is Vajradharma.

original: don yod grub pa'i gnas nas lha chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa de'i phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa de ni rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug ste /
analyzed: don yod grub pa'i gnas nas lha chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa de'i phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa de ni rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug ste /
translated: From the abode of Amoghasiddhi, the great god who holds the form of that [Lokeśvara] is his great seal, which is Vajra Lokeśvara.

original: rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mchog gi dngos grub dam pa ni /🔽padmo 'dod pa bya ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sgrub pa po la ster bas na /
analyzed: rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mchog gi dngos grub dam pa ni / padmo 'dod pa bya ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sgrub pa po la ster bas na /
translated: The supreme, sublime spiritual power of Vajra Lokeśvara🔽is the granting of the accomplishment of Avalokiteśvara, who is called Lotus Desire,

original: padma khro bo'i dbang phyug dpal ster ba yin no //
analyzed: padma khro bo'i dbang phyug dpal ster ba yin no //
translated: to the practitioner, and is the bestowal of the glory of Lotus Wrathful Lord.

original: sangs rgyas dbang gi sangs rgyas nyid //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dbang gi sangs rgyas nyid //
translated: The Buddhahood of Buddha-Consecration

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: is as follows.

original: padma'i sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya chen po ni padma'i dbang phyug ste /
analyzed: padma'i sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya chen po ni padma'i dbang phyug ste /
translated: The great seal of the Buddha of the Lotus is Lotus Lord.

original: de'i dngos grub tu gyur pa'i sangs rgyas nyid ster ba'o //🔽rdo rje padmo grub mchog sbyin //
analyzed: de'i dngos grub tu gyur pa'i sangs rgyas nyid ster ba'o // rdo rje padmo grub mchog sbyin //
translated: The Buddhahood that is his spiritual power is bestowed.🔽The supreme accomplishment of the Vajra Lotus

original: zhes bya ba ni padmo rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje padmo ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni padmo rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje padmo ste /
translated: is as follows. The great seal of Lotus King is the Vajra Lotus.

original: de'i dngo grub tu gyur pa mchog tu dge ba'i padmo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub ster ba'o //
analyzed: de'i dngo grub tu gyur pa mchog tu dge ba'i padmo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub ster ba'o //
translated: The supreme good lotus king is the supreme accomplishment, which grants the accomplishment of the supreme good.

original: 'dod pa'i dbang pos ra 'dod ldan ni padma chags pa'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dbang pos ra 'dod ldan ni padma chags pa'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
translated: The passionate lotus is the great seal of passion for the lotus.

original: padma chags pa nyid ster ba'o //
analyzed: padma chags pa nyid ster ba'o //
translated: It grants passion for the lotus itself.

original: padma legs pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni yang dag pa'o //
analyzed: padma legs pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni yang dag pa'o //
translated: The great seal of the good lotus is the pure one.

original: legs sbyin pa ni padma legs pa'i ngo bo de ster ba'o //
analyzed: legs sbyin pa ni padma legs pa'i ngo bo de ster ba'o //
translated: The good giver is the one who grants that essence of the good lotus.

original: khro gnyer gyis ni khro zhing myur //
analyzed: khro gnyer gyis ni khro zhing myur //
translated: The frowning one is the wrathful one.

original: zhes bya ba ni padma'i khro gnyer rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po ni khro gnyer ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni padma'i khro gnyer rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po ni khro gnyer ro //
translated: The great seal of the king of knowledge, the frowning lotus, is the frown.

original: khro ba dang bcas pas sems can dang sems can ma yin pa gsod pa de zhi bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: khro ba dang bcas pas sems can dang sems can ma yin pa gsod pa de zhi bar byed pa'o //
translated: It pacifies the killing of sentient beings and non-sentient beings with wrath.

original: padmo'i nyi ma ni padma'i gzi brjid kyi phyag rgya chen po ste /
analyzed: padmo'i nyi ma ni padma'i gzi brjid kyi phyag rgya chen po ste /
translated: The lotus sun is the great seal of the lotus splendor.

original: de chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i gzi brjid stsol ba'o //
analyzed: de chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i gzi brjid stsol ba'o //
translated: It bestows the splendor that pervades the entire realm of phenomena.

original: padma'i gzi brjid nyid ster ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: padma'i gzi brjid nyid ster ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he bestows the splendor of the lotus.

original: padmo'i zla ba ni padmo dpal gyi phyag rgya chen pos khyab pa de ni mdangs chen po'o //
analyzed: padmo'i zla ba ni padmo dpal gyi phyag rgya chen pos khyab pa de ni mdangs chen po'o //
translated: The moon of the lotus is the great seal of the glory of the lotus. That is the great splendor.

original: bzhad pas rab tu bzhad pa thob //
analyzed: bzhad pas rab tu bzhad pa thob //
translated: By laughing, one attains the supreme laughter.

original: ces bya ba ni bzhad pa'i phyag rgya chen pos bzhad pas rab tu dga' zhing bzang ba'i bzhad pa ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni bzhad pa'i phyag rgya chen pos bzhad pas rab tu dga' zhing bzang ba'i bzhad pa ste /
translated: The meaning is that by laughing with the great seal of the laughter, one attains the supreme laughter, which is delightful and good.

original: padma bzhad pa'i ngo bo de ster ba'o //
analyzed: padma bzhad pa'i ngo bo de ster ba'o //
translated: The meaning is that he bestows the nature of the laughing lotus.

original: sgrol bas ni chos kyi padma'i phyag rgya chen po des dngos grub mchog rdo rje chos kyi ting nge 'dzin @51a * //🔽thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrol bas ni chos kyi padma'i phyag rgya chen po des dngos grub mchog rdo rje chos kyi ting nge 'dzin @51a * // thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By liberating, one attains the supreme power of Vajradharma, the meditative absorption of Vajradharma, by means of the great seal of the Dharma lotus.

original: padmo'i ral gri ni padma rnon po'i phyag rgya chen po des padma rnon po lta bu'i dngos grub dam pa skal pa bzang po'i shin tu srid pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: padmo'i ral gri ni padma rnon po'i phyag rgya chen po des padma rnon po lta bu'i dngos grub dam pa skal pa bzang po'i shin tu srid pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the sword of the lotus, one attains the supreme power of the sharp lotus, the good fortune of the sharp lotus, by means of the great seal of the sharp lotus.

original: skal bzang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: skal bzang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
translated: The blessed buddhas are of good fortune.

original: srid ba shin tu grub pa yin //
analyzed: srid ba shin tu grub pa yin //
translated: Existence is well-established.

original: zhes gsungs so ;
analyzed: zhes gsungs so ;
translated: Thus it is said.

original: / mgrin sngon padma'i rgyu'i phyag rgya chen po de'i 'gugs pa chen pos padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gugs zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: / mgrin sngon padma'i rgyu'i phyag rgya chen po de'i 'gugs pa chen pos padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gugs zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The great mudra of the blue-throated lotus is the great summoning of all the maṇḍalas of the lotus family.🔽

original: gos dkar ni padma gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o //🔽de'i dngos grub ni padma gsung gi dngos grub ster ba'o //🔽padma gar gyi dbang phyug ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: gos dkar ni padma gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o // de'i dngos grub ni padma gsung gi dngos grub ster ba'o // padma gar gyi dbang phyug ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The great mudra of Nīladaṇḍa Lotus is the great summoning of all maṇḍalas of the Lotus family.🔽The great mudra of Pāṇḍaravāsinī Lotus is the bestowal of the spiritual power of Pāṇḍaravāsinī Lotus.

original: de 'grub pa ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dngos grub ster ba'o //🔽mi 'jigs pa ni padma srung ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: de 'grub pa ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dngos grub ster ba'o // mi 'jigs pa ni padma srung ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The great mudra of Padmanarteśvara is the bestowal of the spiritual power of Padmanarteśvara.🔽The great mudra of Abhayamdada is the bestowal of the spiritual power of Abhayamdada.

original: de grub par gyur pas rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa padma'i bsrung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽rab gtum gyis ni ma rungs 'dul //
analyzed: de grub par gyur pas rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa padma'i bsrung ba zhes bya ba'i don to // rab gtum gyis ni ma rungs 'dul //
translated: The great mudra of Padmavarada is the bestowal of the spiritual power of Padmavarada.

original: zhes bya ba ni padma'i gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya chen pos bdud thams cad 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni padma'i gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya chen pos bdud thams cad 'joms pa'o //
translated: The great mudra of Pracaṇḍa is the subjugation of all māras by the great yakṣa mudra of Padma.

original: padma'i khu tshur ni padma'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya chen po rab tu legs par sgrub par byed pa ni rab sgrub byed de /
analyzed: padma'i khu tshur ni padma'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya chen po rab tu legs par sgrub par byed pa ni rab sgrub byed de /
translated: Lotus Fist is the great seal of the lotus fist, which is well accomplished, which is to say, it is well accomplished.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa sgrub par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa sgrub par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is the accomplishment of the liberation that is naturally luminous, which is to say, it is the accomplishment of the meaning of the naturally luminous.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: de ltar phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes 'bras bu dang bcas pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes 'bras bu dang bcas pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the gnosis of the great seal together with its result,

original: da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: now, the gnosis of the pledge seal is stated, beginning with “Then, etc.”

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslabs pa de'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslabs pa de'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Then” means after the training in the gnosis of the great seal.

original: padma'i rigs ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: padma'i rigs ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The pledge seal of the lotus family is the pledge seal of the great maṇḍala of the tamer of beings.

original: de'i ye shes ni bslab pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ye shes ni bslab pa'o //
translated: Its gnosis is the training.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni //
translated: Having bound the vajra fist,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje dbyings su bshad pa'i rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje dbyings su bshad pa'i rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
translated: The vajra-binding explained in the Vajra Element is bound.

original: mthe bo dang mthe chung gnyis mnyam par bsgreng ba dang ; yi ge hr'i:'i sngags brjod pa dang bcas pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgyar bshad do //
analyzed: mthe bo dang mthe chung gnyis mnyam par bsgreng ba dang ; yi ge hr'i:'i sngags brjod pa dang bcas pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgyar bshad do //
translated: The two thumbs and little fingers are extended together, and the mantra of hrīḥ is recited. This is explained as the gesture of Vairocana.🔽This gesture is the pledge of Dharma,

original: phyag rgya 'di ni chos dam tshig / ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos so //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di ni chos dam tshig / ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos so //
translated: the Dharma of meditative stabilization that is pure by nature.

original: de'i dam tshig ni rgyur gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni rgyur gyur pa ste /
translated: Its pledge is the cause,

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: because

original: chos ni rab tu thob par byed /
analyzed: chos ni rab tu thob par byed /
translated: it causes the attainment of the Dharma.

original: ces bya ba @51b smos te /
analyzed: ces bya ba @51b smos te /
translated: This is stated.

original: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos yin la /
