original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bstan nas /🔽da ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba'i sems @56a * //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bstan nas / da ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba'i sems @56a * //
translated: the great mandala of Subjugation of the Three Worlds is taught.

original: can gyi khams rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: can gyi khams rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to care for the realm of sentient beings to be tamed by the retention mandala of Subjugation of the Three Worlds,

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa ni /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa ni /
translated: the pledge seal of the retention mandala of Subjugation of the Three Worlds is taught.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, the Bhagavān, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the complete and perfect Buddha,

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
translated: The word “then” means immediately after.

original: dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //
analyzed: dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //
translated: It is immediately after the first meditative stabilization of engagement.

original: 'dir dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
analyzed: 'dir dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
translated: Here, the first meditative stabilization of engagement

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa gzung bar bya'o //
translated: should be taken as explained in the Great Mandala of Subjugation of Maras.

original: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po la ltos pas na yang zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po la ltos pas na yang zhes bya'o //
translated: The word “again” is said because it is in relation to the Great Mandala of Subjugation of Maras.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par snang mdzad do ;
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par snang mdzad do ;
translated: The Bhagavat is Vairochana.

original: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni /
analyzed: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni /
translated: All Tathagatas are

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa la mthar thug pa'i padma'i rigs so //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa la mthar thug pa'i padma'i rigs so //
translated: the lotus family from Vairochana to Vajra-Amogha.

original: dran pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos so //
analyzed: dran pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos so //
translated: The Dharma is the perfection of wisdom endowed with mindfulness.

original: de nyid ni gzungs te /
analyzed: de nyid ni gzungs te /
translated: That itself is the dhâraî.

original: de'i dam tshig ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i padma'i rigs de'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'o //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i padma'i rigs de'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'o //
translated: Its commitment is this dhâraî mandala of that lotus family of Vairochana and so forth.

original: de las byung ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i thugs ka'i rdo rje padma las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i thugs ka'i rdo rje padma las byung ba'o //
translated: The one who arises from that is the one who arises from the vajra lotus at the heart of the one who tames migrators.

original: de skad du bshad pa des byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul par nus pa ste /
analyzed: de skad du bshad pa des byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul par nus pa ste /
translated: By that explanation, he is able to emanate the dhāraṇī maṇḍala.🔽The samādhi called “the one who is unstained by obscurations like a lotus” is the one who emanates his own family.

original: padma bzhin du sgrib pa rnams kyis gos pa med pa'i ming 'di skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rigs sprul par mdzad pa'i rjes thogs la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa
analyzed: padma bzhin du sgrib pa rnams kyis gos pa med pa'i ming 'di skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rigs sprul par mdzad pa'i rjes thogs la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa
translated: Immediately after that, he spoke this sublime self-knowledge that will be explained.

original: ni rig pa dam pa bshad pa'o //
analyzed: ni rig pa dam pa bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the sublime knowledge.

original: de ltar phyag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje spyan dang / rdo rje sna tshogs dang ; 'gro ba 'dul ba dang / gtsug phud sangs rgyas dang / ting nge 'dzin padma dang / nges pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar phyag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje spyan dang / rdo rje sna tshogs dang ; 'gro ba 'dul ba dang / gtsug phud sangs rgyas dang / ting nge 'dzin padma dang / nges pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, Vajrapāṇi, Vajra Essence, Vajra Eye, Vajra Variety, Tamer of Migrators, Buddha Topknot, Lotus Samādhi, and Lord of Certainty emanated the dhāraṇī maṇḍala.

original: rig pa dam pa gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rig pa dam pa gsungs pa'o //
translated: is the statement of the holy awareness.

original: des kyang padma dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i lha mo la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: des kyang padma dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i lha mo la sogs pa nas /
translated: By that, the dhāraṇīs beginning with the goddess Padmadhātviśvarī

original: padma 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi gzungs rnams 'jig rten dbang phyug gi thugs ka'i padma las byung bas sems can gyi khams thams cad gzungs kyi ye shes kyi rnam par sbyangs nas slar log ste /
analyzed: padma 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi gzungs rnams 'jig rten dbang phyug gi thugs ka'i padma las byung bas sems can gyi khams thams cad gzungs kyi ye shes kyi rnam par sbyangs nas slar log ste /
translated: up to Padamāṇinī, having arisen from the lotus in the heart of Lokeśvara, purify the entire realm of sentient beings with the awareness of dhāraṇī, and then return.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du padma dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i @56b gzungs rnams mchod rten la sogs pa'i gzungs kyi nang du chud nas bzhugs so zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du padma dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i @56b gzungs rnams mchod rten la sogs pa'i gzungs kyi nang du chud nas bzhugs so zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that they abide in the form of the maṇḍala of the dhāraṇī of the vajra realm, the dhāraṇīs beginning with Padmadhātviśvarī, having entered the interior of the dhāraṇī such as the stūpa.

original: yang de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas brtsams nas /
analyzed: yang de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas brtsams nas /
translated: Then, beginning with “Then, the Blessed One entered the samādhi called ‘The Lotus of the Mind of All Tathāgatas’,”

original: aom karma sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: aom karma sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: By this much of the text, beginning with “Oṃ, karma samaya hūṃ,” the second meditative stabilization called “the supreme royal maṇḍala” of the Dhāraṇīśvararāja maṇḍala is stated.

original: de nas bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Then, the gathering, consecration, and so forth, should be understood as the third meditative stabilization called “the supreme royal rite” of the Dhāraṇīśvararāja maṇḍala.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams ni dkyil 'khor der dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams ni dkyil 'khor der dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the meaning of “the powers that are taught in the Dhāraṇīśvararāja maṇḍala are to be accomplished by one who has obtained the pledge and initiation in that maṇḍala,”

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then,” and so on.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab pa ste /
translated: “ Then” is the proper occasion.

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rang gi rigs ni padma'i rigs te dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rang gi rigs ni padma'i rigs te dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The lineage of the Lord Avalokitdvara, who is the discipliner of the world, is the lotus lineage, the pledge seal being the symbolic seal.

original: dkyil 'khor gsungs shing bshad pa'o //🔽de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gsungs shing bshad pa'o // de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
translated: The mandala is taught and explained.

original: rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi rjes thogs la'o //
translated: Then, immediately after the practice of awareness,🔽the mandala of the dhâranî of the discipliner of the world is taught.

original: de la 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnal 'byor pas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
analyzed: de la 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnal 'byor pas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
translated: There, the practitioner of the discipliner of the world should perform the great yoga as explained in the great mandala of the discipliner of the world.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i snying po dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rang gi snying po rnams kyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed cing go rims bzhin du bzhag la /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i snying po dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rang gi snying po rnams kyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed cing go rims bzhin du bzhag la /
translated: He should generate the mandala of the dhâranî of the discipliner of the world with the essence mantras taught in the mandala of the four seals of the discipliner of the world and with the essence mantras to be taught, and he should arrange them in order.

original: gzungs kyi lha so so dang bdag nyid lhan cig gnyis su med par bsams nas /
analyzed: gzungs kyi lha so so dang bdag nyid lhan cig gnyis su med par bsams nas /
translated: He should imagine that he and each of the dhâranî deities are nondual.

original: gzungs kyi rig pa re re zhing yang bzlas pa khri bya'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi rig pa re re zhing yang bzlas pa khri bya'o //
translated: For each of the dhāraṇī mantras, one should do ten thousand recitations.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug ste ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams nas /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug ste ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams nas /
translated: Then, sitting in the center of the maṇḍala ground, one should begin the cultivation of the three samādhis,

original: dkyil 'khor de zhag bdun bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor de zhag bdun bsgom pa'am /
translated: and cultivate that maṇḍala for seven days.

original: yang na gnas gzhan du bsgom par bya ba de lta bus ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod par gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: yang na gnas gzhan du bsgom par bya ba de lta bus ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod par gyur pa yin no //
translated: Or, having cultivated it in another place, one should engage in the conduct of the vidyādhara.

original: de nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la /
analyzed: de nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la /
translated: Then, again sitting in the center of the maṇḍala ground,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum pa bsgom pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bshad ma thag pa byas @57a * //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum pa bsgom pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bshad ma thag pa byas @57a * //
translated: one should perform the just-explained ritual of cultivating the three samādhis,

original: nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
translated: and then draw the maṇḍala.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rgyu de'i phyir gyi don to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rgyu de'i phyir gyi don to //
translated: The phrase then means for that reason.

original: gang gi phyir 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med na des 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams rjes su bzung bar mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu de'i phyir rab tu bshad par bya'o /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med na des 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams rjes su bzung bar mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu de'i phyir rab tu bshad par bya'o /
translated: For what reason? Because, if one does not enter the mandala of the Dhāraṇī of Subjugating Evil Forces, one will not be able to care for the realm of sentient beings to be subjugated by it. For that reason, it should be fully explained.

original: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //
translated: The supreme mandala of the seal

original: mchog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: is the supreme one.

original: de ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: de ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la //
translated: It is like the Vajra Realm.

original: zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: sprul pa'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni 'dir rdo rje dbyings te /
analyzed: sprul pa'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni 'dir rdo rje dbyings te /
translated: The mandala of the emanated form is here the Vajra Realm.

original: de dang 'dra bas na rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra bas na rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: Since it is like that, it is like the Vajra Realm.

original: padma'i gsang ba zhes bshad pa'o//
analyzed: padma'i gsang ba zhes bshad pa'o//
translated: The lotus secret is explained.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: padma ni padma'i rigs rnams so //
analyzed: padma ni padma'i rigs rnams so //
translated: The lotus is the lotus family.

original: gsang ba ni padma'i gsang ba'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni padma'i gsang ba'o //
translated: The secret is the lotus secret.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
translated: In the manner of the great mandala,

original: zhes bya ba na 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyings su de'i rig pa zlos shing bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba na 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyings su de'i rig pa zlos shing bri bar bya'o //
translated: one should recite and draw the knowledge of that in the realm of the great mandala of Subjugating Evil Forces.

original: nam mkha'i phyogs nas mchod rten gyi gzugs kyis phab la bris pa'i mchod rten gyi gzugs dang gcig tu bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i phyogs nas mchod rten gyi gzugs kyis phab la bris pa'i mchod rten gyi gzugs dang gcig tu bya'o //
translated: From the sky, the form of a stupa is brought down and united with the drawn form of a stupa.

original: de bzhin du phyag rgya gzhan la yang rang gi mtshan ma rnams phab nas gcig tu bsre bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du phyag rgya gzhan la yang rang gi mtshan ma rnams phab nas gcig tu bsre bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, having brought down the individual signs of the other seals, they are mixed into one.

original: de'i dbus padma bzang po la //
analyzed: de'i dbus padma bzang po la //
translated: In the center of that, an excellent lotus,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
translated: is the Lady of the Vajra Realm.

original: de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du //
analyzed: de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du //
translated: In all the directions of that,

original: zhes bya ba ni de'i phyogs bzhir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de'i phyogs bzhir ro //
translated: in the four directions of that.

original: dam tshig mchog rnams zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dam tshig mchog rnams zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The supreme commitments,

original: dam tshig de'i mchog ni dam tshig mchog ste /🔽rigs thams cad bsdus pa na dam pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig de'i mchog ni dam tshig mchog ste / rigs thams cad bsdus pa na dam pa'o //
translated: the supreme commitment is the supreme commitment,🔽the best of commitments,

original: gang gi phyir so so'i phyag rgya rnams kyis rigs thams cad la rgyas 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir so so'i phyag rgya rnams kyis rigs thams cad la rgyas 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the individual seals seal all the clans, since they are the best of commitments.

original: lhag ma bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lhag ma bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Like the remaining ones,

original: ji ltar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du bris pa de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du bris pa de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means just as they are drawn in the mandala of the Taming of the World.

original: rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni //
analyzed: rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni //
translated: Having crossed over with the speed of a vajra,

original: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: as before.

original: sna tshogs gzugs mchog dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs mchog dkyil 'khor du //
translated: In the mandala of the supreme form of variety,

original: zhes bya ba 'gro ba 'dul ba sna tshogs kyi gzugs can de gtso bo mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni sna tshogs gzugs mchog dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'gro ba 'dul ba sna tshogs kyi gzugs can de gtso bo mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni sna tshogs gzugs mchog dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: the mandala of the supreme principal form of the variety of forms of the subjugation of beings is the mandala of the supreme form of variety.

original: de yi dbus su padma yi //
analyzed: de yi dbus su padma yi //
translated: In the center of that,

original: bskor ba'i padmo bri bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bskor ba'i padmo bri bar bya // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: one should draw a lotus surrounded by lotuses.

original: de la dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su ni /
analyzed: de la dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su ni /
translated: In that, in the center of that mandala,

original: dbus kyi cha'i padma la rdo rje padma de la tshad phra mo'i rdo rje padma der sprul pas yongs su bskor ba'o //
analyzed: dbus kyi cha'i padma la rdo rje padma de la tshad phra mo'i rdo rje padma der sprul pas yongs su bskor ba'o //
translated: in the center part of the lotus, one should draw a vajra lotus. In that subtle vajra lotus, one should draw a lotus surrounded by emanations.

original: de yi phyogs rnams thams cad @57b du ;
analyzed: de yi phyogs rnams thams cad @57b du ;
translated: In all the directions of that,

original: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: and so forth, is easy to understand.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught:

original: lha thams cad kyi gnas rnams su kha khyer gsum pa'i khri la gnas pa'i padma bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: lha thams cad kyi gnas rnams su kha khyer gsum pa'i khri la gnas pa'i padma bri bar bya'o //
translated: In all the places of the deities, one should draw a lotus standing on a three-layered ledge.

original: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor de'i dbus kyi padma la rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su mchod rten dbu nub tu bstan pa 'od zer dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor de'i dbus kyi padma la rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su mchod rten dbu nub tu bstan pa 'od zer dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the center of that mandala, on the lotus in the place of Vairocana, one should draw a stupa with a spire facing west, together with light-rays.

original: de'i shar phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje sems ma'i gnas su rdo rje rtse lnga pa dbu shar du bstan pa chos kyi rdo rje ma'o //
analyzed: de'i shar phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje sems ma'i gnas su rdo rje rtse lnga pa dbu shar du bstan pa chos kyi rdo rje ma'o //
translated: In the eastern quarter, in the place of Vajrarati, one should draw a five-pointed vajra with the top facing east, which is Dharmavajrā.

original: lho phyogs su padmas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu dbu lho phyogs su bstan pa sangs rgyas dbang bskur ma'o //
analyzed: lho phyogs su padmas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu dbu lho phyogs su bstan pa sangs rgyas dbang bskur ma'o //
translated: In the southern quarter, one should draw a wish-fulfilling gem marked with a lotus, with the top facing south, which is Buddhapāṇi.

original: nub phyogs su rdo rje padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa mdog dmar skya dbu nub tu bstan pa padma'i padma dang dam tshig sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i ming gnyis dang ldan pa /
analyzed: nub phyogs su rdo rje padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa mdog dmar skya dbu nub tu bstan pa padma'i padma dang dam tshig sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i ming gnyis dang ldan pa /
translated: In the western quarter, one should draw a pale-red lotus with sixteen petals, with the top facing west, which has two names, Padma and Samayavajra.

original: byang phyogs su padma 'dab ma bzhi pa sna tshogs pa'i mdog can dbu byang du bstan pa'o //
analyzed: byang phyogs su padma 'dab ma bzhi pa sna tshogs pa'i mdog can dbu byang du bstan pa'o //
translated: In the northern quarter, one should draw a four-petaled lotus of various colors, with the top facing north.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gnas su padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa mdog dmar skya sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje padma la de las gzhan pa'i padmas yongs su bskor ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gnas su padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa mdog dmar skya sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje padma la de las gzhan pa'i padmas yongs su bskor ba'o //
translated: In the abode of the Subduer of Beings is a sixteen-petaled lotus of a reddish hue, with the characteristics explained above, with a vajra and lotus, and surrounded by other lotuses.

original: padma sangs rgyas kyi gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dbu shar du bltas pa'o //
analyzed: padma sangs rgyas kyi gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dbu shar du bltas pa'o //
translated: In the abode of the Buddha Lotus is a five-pronged vajra marked with a lotus, with the head facing east.

original: padmo rgyal po'i gnas su padma'i lcags kyu dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / padmo //
analyzed: padmo rgyal po'i gnas su padma'i lcags kyu dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / padmo //
translated: In the abode of the Lotus King is a lotus hook, a sword, a vajra, and a lotus.

original: padma chags pa'i gnas su padma'i mda' gzhu /
analyzed: padma chags pa'i gnas su padma'i mda' gzhu /
translated: In the abode of the Lotus Passion is a lotus bow and arrow.

original: padma legs pa'i gnas su padma dang bcas pa'i se gol gtogs pa'i khu chur gnyis so //
analyzed: padma legs pa'i gnas su padma dang bcas pa'i se gol gtogs pa'i khu chur gnyis so //
translated: In the abode of the Lotus Good is a pair of cymbals with a lotus, and a lotus.

original: gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi gnas su 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ral pa'i dbus su gnas pa'i rdo rje padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'o //
analyzed: gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi gnas su 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ral pa'i dbus su gnas pa'i rdo rje padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'o //
translated: In the abode of the Buddha Topknot is a sixteen-petaled lotus vajra in the middle of the hair-topknot of Lokeśvara.

original: padma khro gnyer gyi gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu /
analyzed: padma khro gnyer gyi gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu /
translated: In the abode of the Lotus Frown is a wish-fulfilling gem marked with a lotus.

original: padma nyi ma'i gnas su padma'i lte ba la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: padma nyi ma'i gnas su padma'i lte ba la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: In the abode of Padma Sun, there is a sun mandala in the center of a lotus.

original: padma'i rgyal mtshan gyi gnas su zla ba phyed pa la brten pa'i padmas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtse mo can gyi rgyal mtshan /
analyzed: padma'i rgyal mtshan gyi gnas su zla ba phyed pa la brten pa'i padmas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtse mo can gyi rgyal mtshan /
translated: In the abode of Padma Banner, there is a banner with a wish-fulfilling jewel at the top, marked with a lotus, and supported by a half-moon.

original: padma bzhad pa'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis kyi bar du chud pa'i so'i phreng ba'o //
analyzed: padma bzhad pa'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis kyi bar du chud pa'i so'i phreng ba'o //
translated: In the abode of Padma Smile, there is a garland of pearls, between two five-pointed vajras marked with lotuses.

original: padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas su padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i padma'i rdo rje padma'o //
analyzed: padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas su padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i padma'i rdo rje padma'o //
translated: In the abode of Padma Samadhi, there is a lotus vajra, a vajra in the center of a lotus with sixteen petals.

original: padma sgrol ma'i gnas su rdo rje padma /
analyzed: padma sgrol ma'i gnas su rdo rje padma /
translated: In the abode of Padma Tara, there is a vajra lotus.

original: padma rnon po'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i ral gri /
analyzed: padma rnon po'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i ral gri /
translated: In the abode of Padma Tika, there is a sword marked with a lotus.

original: padma rgyu'i gnas su padma'i lte ba la rdo rje 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang / @58a * //
analyzed: padma rgyu'i gnas su padma'i lte ba la rdo rje 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang / @58a * //
translated: In the abode of Padma Cause, there is an eight-spoked vajra wheel in the center of a lotus.

original: dung dang be con dang padma'o //
analyzed: dung dang be con dang padma'o //
translated: There is also a conch, a club, and a lotus.

original: padma gsung pa'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i lce /
analyzed: padma gsung pa'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i lce /
translated: In the abode of Padma Speech, there is a tongue marked with a lotus.

original: padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi gnas su sna tshogs padma 'dab ma bzhi pa /🔽padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gnas su gar byed pa'i lag pa bzung ba'i sna tshogs padma /
analyzed: padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi gnas su sna tshogs padma 'dab ma bzhi pa / padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gnas su gar byed pa'i lag pa bzung ba'i sna tshogs padma /
translated: In the place of Padma Niśācarā, a multicolored lotus with four petals.🔽In the place of Padma Nāṭyeśvara, a multicolored lotus held by a hand dancing.

original: padma srung ba'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i go cha /
analyzed: padma srung ba'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i go cha /
translated: In the place of Padma Rakṣa, armor marked with lotuses.

original: padma gnod sbyin gyi gnas su mche ba gnyis kyi rtsa ba padmas mtshan pa /
analyzed: padma gnod sbyin gyi gnas su mche ba gnyis kyi rtsa ba padmas mtshan pa /
translated: In the place of Padma Yakṣa, the roots of two fangs marked with lotuses.

original: padma khu tshur gyi gnas su padma'i dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis bzung ba'i padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
analyzed: padma khu tshur gyi gnas su padma'i dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis bzung ba'i padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
translated: In the place of Padmamuṣṭi, a five-pronged vajra marked with a lotus held by a lotus pledge fist.

original: padma sgeg mo'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis /🔽padma'i phreng ba'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba /
analyzed: padma sgeg mo'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis / padma'i phreng ba'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba /
translated: In the place of Padmakeyūrā, two five-pronged vajras marked with lotuses.🔽In the place of Padma mālā, a jewel rosary marked with lotuses.

original: padma glu ma'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i pi wang /
analyzed: padma glu ma'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i pi wang /
translated: In the place of Padma gītā, a lute marked with lotuses.

original: padma gar ma'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang bcas pa'i lag pas gar skor ba /
analyzed: padma gar ma'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang bcas pa'i lag pas gar skor ba /
translated: In the place of Padma nrtyā, a hand with a three-pronged vajra marked with a lotus, dancing in a circle.

original: bdug pa ma'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i spos snod /
analyzed: bdug pa ma'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i spos snod /
translated: In the place of Dhūmā, a perfume case marked with a lotus.

original: me tog ma'i gnas su me tog gi za ma tog //🔽mar me ma'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i mchod sdong /
analyzed: me tog ma'i gnas su me tog gi za ma tog // mar me ma'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i mchod sdong /
translated: In the place of Puṣpā, a flower basket.🔽In the place of Dīpā, a lamp post marked with a lotus.

original: dri ma'i gnas su dri'i dung chos padmas mtshan pa /
analyzed: dri ma'i gnas su dri'i dung chos padmas mtshan pa /
translated: In the place of Gandhā, a perfume conch marked with a lotus.

original: rta mgrin gyi gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i lcags kyu /
analyzed: rta mgrin gyi gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i lcags kyu /
translated: In the place of Hayagrīva, an iron hook marked with a lotus.

original: don yod zhags pa'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i zhags pa /
analyzed: don yod zhags pa'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i zhags pa /
translated: In the place of Amoghapāśa, a noose marked with a lotus.🔽In the place of Nīlāmbaradhara, a chain marked with a lotus.

original: lcags sgrog gi gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog / padma 'bebs pa'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i dril bu /
analyzed: lcags sgrog gi gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog / padma 'bebs pa'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i dril bu /
translated: In the place of Padmanartteśvara, a bell marked with a lotus.

original: byams pa la sogs pa rnams ni dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i mtshan ma sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas khyams su bri bar bya'o ;
analyzed: byams pa la sogs pa rnams ni dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i mtshan ma sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas khyams su bri bar bya'o ;
translated: Maitreya and so forth are to be drawn in the portico in accordance with the previously explained reasoning, with the signs as explained in the great maṇḍala.

original: / mtshan ma thams cad kyang 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang bcas pa shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang du mgo bltas pa go rims bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: / mtshan ma thams cad kyang 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang bcas pa shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang du mgo bltas pa go rims bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
translated: All the signs are to be drawn with garlands of light rays, facing east, south, west, and north, respectively.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
translated: The word “then” means immediately.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ji lta ba bzhin du sgo dbye ba byas la bum pa thams cad dang bum pa gang ba ji lta ba'i gnas su bzhag la /
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ji lta ba bzhin du sgo dbye ba byas la bum pa thams cad dang bum pa gang ba ji lta ba'i gnas su bzhag la /
translated: Having drawn the maṇḍala in that way, one should open the door as before, and having placed all the vases and the filled vases in their proper places,

original: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rig pa rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du bzlas nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas /
analyzed: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rig pa rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du bzlas nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas /
translated: one should recite the vidyās taught in the Dhāraṇī Maṇḍala as before.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor @58b las bshad pa'i rdo rje chos ma bcings la zhugs nas /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor @58b las bshad pa'i rdo rje chos ma bcings la zhugs nas /
translated: Having entered into the binding of Vajradharma as taught in the Maṇḍala of the Dhāraṇī of Subduing Evil Forces,

original: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i padma brtul zhugs 'dzin pa'i bar du byas la /
analyzed: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i padma brtul zhugs 'dzin pa'i bar du byas la /
translated: one should perform the lotus observances from the entrance up to the holding of the vow.

original: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa yang byas nas dkyil 'khor rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa yang byas nas dkyil 'khor rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Having also performed the self-consecration and so forth, one should accomplish the maṇḍala with the vajra.

original: de nas bsdu ba byas la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa'i rjes thogs nyid la /
analyzed: de nas bsdu ba byas la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa'i rjes thogs nyid la /
translated: Then, having gathered, immediately after the praise with the one hundred and eight names,

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni padma rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du'o //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni padma rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du'o //
translated: Here means in the retention maṇḍala of the lotus family.

original: dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas zhes bya ba la /
translated: Having performed the extensive rite of summoning and so forth,

original: de la dgug pa ni padma'i rigs kyi gzungs rnams rang rang gi sgo dang nye bar rta mgrin gyi las kyi phyag rgyas dgug la gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: de la dgug pa ni padma'i rigs kyi gzungs rnams rang rang gi sgo dang nye bar rta mgrin gyi las kyi phyag rgyas dgug la gzhag pa'o //
translated: therein, summoning is summoning the retention of the lotus family with the action seal of Hayagrīva near their own door and placing them there.

original: sogs pa smos pa ni gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / mchod yon dbul ba dang / phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang / phyag bzhi byas la /
analyzed: sogs pa smos pa ni gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / mchod yon dbul ba dang / phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang / phyag bzhi byas la /
translated: The and so forth refers to inducting, binding, controlling, offering water, sealing with the four seals, conferring empowerment, making offerings, and performing the four prostrations.

original: gnang ba ma nos pa ni dgug pa la sogs pa dang por byas pa gang yin pa de ni dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: gnang ba ma nos pa ni dgug pa la sogs pa dang por byas pa gang yin pa de ni dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
translated: The extensive rite of summoning and so forth is that which is done first, such as summoning and so forth, without receiving permission.

original: bshad ma thag pa de byas nas /
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa de byas nas /
translated: Having performed the previously explained rite,

original: padma'i slob ma ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste /
analyzed: padma'i slob ma ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste /
translated: one should induct the lotus disciple just as before.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs su byin gyis brlab po //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs su byin gyis brlab po //
translated: One should bless them with the form of the Vināyaka.

original: slob ma ni padma'i slob ma'o //
analyzed: slob ma ni padma'i slob ma'o //
translated: The disciple is the lotus disciple.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying po dang bcas pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas slob dpon gyis bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying po dang bcas pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas slob dpon gyis bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The master should perform the consecration with the pledge seal of the essence of the Subjugation of the Three Worlds, as explained in the great mandala of the Subjugation of the Three Worlds.

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i ji lta ba'i cho ga de dang gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje chos ma bcings la 'jug par bya'o //🔽'di skad du khyod kyis gsang ba 'di su la yang ma smra shig ces bya ba la sogs pa dang / de nas phab nas 'di skad du khyod kyi rmi lam du ci snang zhes dris nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i ji lta ba'i cho ga de dang gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje chos ma bcings la 'jug par bya'o // 'di skad du khyod kyis gsang ba 'di su la yang ma smra shig ces bya ba la sogs pa dang / de nas phab nas 'di skad du khyod kyi rmi lam du ci snang zhes dris nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Then, with the rite as explained in the great mandala of the Subjugation of the Three Worlds, and with the form as explained in the mandala of the Vajra Sphere, one should enter the mandala.🔽Then, having made him drink the vajra water, and so on, one should perform all the rites as explained in the great mandala of the Subjugation of the Three Worlds, and then, having made him enter, one should say, Do not speak of this secret to anyone, and so on, and then, having made him prostrate, one should say, What did you see in your dream?

original: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje chu btung ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje chu btung ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
translated: Then, having made him drink the vajra water, and so on, one should perform all the rites as explained in the great mandala of the Subjugation of the Three Worlds, and then, having made him enter, one should say, “Do not speak of this secret to anyone, and so on, and then, having made him prostrate, one should say, “What did you see in your dream?”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la /
translated: All the Tathagatas consecrate you.🔽 May Vajrasattva descend upon me!

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig / ces bya ba'i cho gas snga ma bzhin du dbab par byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig / ces bya ba'i cho gas snga ma bzhin du dbab par byas la /
translated: With this rite, as before, one should cause the descent.

original: de nas phab la 'di skad du /
analyzed: de nas phab la 'di skad du /
translated: Then, having caused the descent, one should say this:

original: rdo rje dam tshig gis khyod kyi rmi lam du ci zhig snang zhes dris pa ni //
analyzed: rdo rje dam tshig gis khyod kyi rmi lam du ci zhig snang zhes dris pa ni //
translated: By the Vajra pledge, what did you see in your dream?

original: dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po @59a * //
analyzed: dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po @59a * //
translated: White, yellow, red,

original: dang ; nag po dang ljang gu rnams sna tshogs pa ci zhig snang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dang ; nag po dang ljang gu rnams sna tshogs pa ci zhig snang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: black, and green, what did you see?

original: ci lta ba bzhin du gdong g-yogs bkrol te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ci lta ba bzhin du gdong g-yogs bkrol te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: As before, one should remove the blindfold,

original: me tog gi phreng ba dor la /
analyzed: me tog gi phreng ba dor la /
translated: having cast the flower garland.

original: de nas de blangs te spyi bor bcings nas /
analyzed: de nas de blangs te spyi bor bcings nas /
translated: Then, having taken it, one should bind it to the head.

original: de'i rjes la gdong g-yogs bkrol pa'i sngags kyis gdong g-yogs bcings pa bkrol lo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i rjes la gdong g-yogs bkrol pa'i sngags kyis gdong g-yogs bcings pa bkrol lo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: After that, one should remove the blindfold with the mantra Removing the blindfold,

original: ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
translated: which means as before.

original: yang de nas sor bzhi pa'i tshad kyi yu ba dang bcas pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi padma 'chad pas g-yogs te /
analyzed: yang de nas sor bzhi pa'i tshad kyi yu ba dang bcas pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi padma 'chad pas g-yogs te /
translated: Then, the secret mandala base, which is four fingerbreadths in size and has a handle, is placed on top of the lotus.

original: slob ma la dbang bskur nas /
analyzed: slob ma la dbang bskur nas /
translated: The empowerment is conferred on the disciple.

original: ming gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pas kyang dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: ming gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pas kyang dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: The empowerment of the name and so forth are also conferred.

original: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang / slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang / slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the extensive ritual of the master’s acts and the ritual of the disciple’s entrance,

original: @64a * // phyis ni 'gro ba 'dul ba dang mtshungs par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @64a * // phyis ni 'gro ba 'dul ba dang mtshungs par yang 'gyur ro //

original: padma la ni bud med bsam //
analyzed: padma la ni bud med bsam //

translated: The hair-tuft Buddha seal explained in the Dhāraṇīsaṃbhāra Mandala is the hair-tuft Buddha, and one should visualize oneself in the form of the hair-tuft Buddha.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /

analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor byas la /

original: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /

analyzed: bdag nyid gtsug phud sangs rgyas su bsams nas /

analyzed: gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /

analyzed: rang gi gdan gyi mdun du yi ge shr'i las ral pa'i dbus na padma chen po dang ldan pa sprul la de nyid las gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi lha mo'i gzugs su bsam par bya'o //

analyzed: aom buddha ma ku ta sa na yo ga san ya shr'i zhes brjod cing /

analyzed: snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma dang lhan cig tu gyur par bsgom par bya'o //

analyzed: phyis gtsug phud sangs rgyas dang yang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //

original: padma la ni bud med bsam //
analyzed: padma la ni bud med bsam //
translated: One should visualize a woman on a lotus.

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya la padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lha mor bsam mo //

analyzed: de steng padmor bdag bsgyur te //

analyzed: rtse zhing padmo padmo'i mchog / dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //

translated: This means that one should meditate on oneself as the image of the lotus samādhi, and by meditating on that image, one will attain the pure spiritual power.

original: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa @64b yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa @64b yin te /

analyzed: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin padma'i rnal 'byor byas la /

analyzed: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /

analyzed: bdag nyid padma'i ting nge 'dzin du bsam par bya'o //

analyzed: de nas yi ge de nyid las padma'i steng du padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rdo rje padma'i phyag rgya sprul la /

original: padmo'i padmo de nyid las //
analyzed: padmo'i padmo de nyid las //
translated: From that very lotus of the lotus,

analyzed: padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lha mo'i gzugs su bsam par bya'o //

analyzed: de nas snga ma bzhin du bsdu ba la sogs pa byas te /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyor bas bsgoms la aom padma padma sam yo ga s'a dha ma ti /

analyzed: zhes brjod cing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas ji srid mngon sum du gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bya'o //

analyzed: de nas mthar mtshan thog thag de nyid bsgoms pa dang byin nas des lhan cig tu sbyor bar byed cing de nyid lus la zhugs par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: phyis ting nge 'dzin padma nyid du yang 'gyur ro // padma la ni bud med bsam //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das padma nges pa'i dbang phyug de'i padma'i steng du bdag nyid gyur te bsgom par bya'o //

original: ji zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: ji zhig byed ce na /
translated: What does one do?

original: rtse zhing padmo mchog ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: rtse zhing padmo mchog ces bya ba ni /
translated: “Playing with the supreme lotus” means

original: sna tshogs dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: sna tshogs dngos grub thob par 'gyur //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni padma nges pa'i dbang phyug de la dngos grub sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

analyzed: bdag nyid padma nges pa'i dbang phyug tu bsgom mo //

analyzed: mdun du padma'i dbus su sna tshogs padma 'dab ma bzhi pa padma phra mo'i 'khor gyis bskor bar bsam mo //

analyzed: phyis 'di padma nges pa'i dbang phyug dang yang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de ltar dngos grub kyi ye shes bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the knowledge of the powers,🔽now, in order to teach the knowledge of the powers of the retention maṇḍala of the Tamer of All Haughty Spirits,

analyzed: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcings la ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /

analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Just as it is” means

analyzed: mna'i snying po byin la padma'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba dang de'i phyag rgya chen po ni /

analyzed: gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po ste ;
translated: the secret great seal,

analyzed: de'i ye shes bslab par bya'o // sor mo'i rtse sprad padmor bya //
translated: one should train in its knowledge.🔽“The tips of the fingers touching, make a lotus”

analyzed: rig pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The knowledge is as follows:

analyzed: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta dharmma sa ma ye h'um zhes pa rig pa 'di zlos shing bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms na /

analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rdo rje khro bo mdzub gnyis sprad //

analyzed: aom badzra sa ma ya h'um zhes zlos shing bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms na /

original: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rdo rje dbyings las bshad @65b pa'i rdo rje snying po'i rnal 'byor byas la 'di nyid bcings te /
translated: Having performed the yoga of Vajra Essence as explained in the Vajra Element, bind this mudra.

analyzed: aom ma ni ratna sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba dang / bdag nyid rdo rje snying por bsgoms na rdo rje snying po dang 'dra bar 'gyur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Recite the knowledge-mantra “Oṃ maṇi ratna samaye hūṃ” and meditate on yourself as Vajra Essence, and you will become like Vajra Essence.

original: padmo ltar zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: padmo ltar zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The lotus is as follows:

original: rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i rdo rje chos kyi rnal 'byor byas la 'di bcings te /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i rdo rje chos kyi rnal 'byor byas la 'di bcings te /
translated: Having performed the yoga of Vajra Dharma as explained in the Vajra Element, bind this mudra.

original: aom padma sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba'i rig pa brjod cing bdag nyid rdo rje chos su bsgoms na rdo rje spyan dang 'dra bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aom padma sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba'i rig pa brjod cing bdag nyid rdo rje chos su bsgoms na rdo rje spyan dang 'dra bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Recite the knowledge-mantra “Oṃ padma samaye hūṃ” and meditate on yourself as Vajra Dharma, and you will become like Vajra Eye.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa'ang de bzhin te //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa'ang de bzhin te //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The vajra binding is also like that.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo gnyis ji ltar grags pa'i rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo gnyis ji ltar grags pa'i rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te /
translated: Form the two vajra fists, and with the two index fingers form the well-known vajra binding.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje las kyi rnal 'byor byas la phyis phyag rgya 'di bcings te /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje las kyi rnal 'byor byas la phyis phyag rgya 'di bcings te /
translated: Then, having performed the yoga of vajra action as explained in the Great Mandala of the Vajra Realm, form this mudra.

original: aom badzra karma sa ma ya h'um zhes zlos shing bdag nyid rdo rje las su bsgoms na /
analyzed: aom badzra karma sa ma ya h'um zhes zlos shing bdag nyid rdo rje las su bsgoms na /
translated: Reciting Oṃ vajra karma samaya hūṃ, meditate on oneself as Vajra Action.

original: de rdo rje las dang 'dra bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rdo rje las dang 'dra bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, one will be accomplished as being like Vajra Action.

original: rdo rje bcings pa bsdams nas ni //🔽gung mo gnyis ni myu gur bsgreng //
analyzed: rdo rje bcings pa bsdams nas ni // gung mo gnyis ni myu gur bsgreng //
translated: Forming the vajra binding,🔽the two middle fingers are extended like sprouts,

original: mdzub mo srin lag gnyis bkug pa'i //
analyzed: mdzub mo srin lag gnyis bkug pa'i //
translated: and the two index fingers and two ring fingers are bent.

original: phyag rgya sh'akya thub par bstan //
analyzed: phyag rgya sh'akya thub par bstan //
translated: This mudra is taught as Śākyamuni.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa las /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa las /
translated: This is from the vajra binding.

original: gung mo gnyis myu gu ltar bsgreng la /
analyzed: gung mo gnyis myu gu ltar bsgreng la /
translated: The two middle fingers are extended like sprouts,

original: mdzub mo rdang srin lag gnyis padma ltar byas pa 'di ni sh'akya thub pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo rdang srin lag gnyis padma ltar byas pa 'di ni sh'akya thub pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The two index and little fingers like a lotus is the mudra of Shakyamuni Vairochana and Vajradhatviashvari.🔽The Dharma vajra is placed at the heart,

original: chos kyi rdo rje snying gar gzhag / bsgyur te dpral bar gzhag pa dang // ting nge 'dzin tshul pang du gzhag / bsgyur nas spyi bor gzhag par bya //🔽zhes bya ba ni /🔽rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
analyzed: chos kyi rdo rje snying gar gzhag / bsgyur te dpral bar gzhag pa dang // ting nge 'dzin tshul pang du gzhag / bsgyur nas spyi bor gzhag par bya // zhes bya ba ni / rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
translated: turned and placed at the forehead,🔽the samadhi gesture is placed at the lap,

original: gung mo gnyis ni mnyam sbyar ba //
analyzed: gung mo gnyis ni mnyam sbyar ba //
translated: turned and placed at the crown.🔽This is the mudra of the Dharma vajra of the Dharmavajra Goddess abiding in the place of Shakyamuni Vairochana and Vajradhatviashvari.

original: rdo rje chos zhes grags pa yi //
analyzed: rdo rje chos zhes grags pa yi //
translated: The Dharma vajra is placed at the heart,🔽turned and placed at the forehead,

original: dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed pa'o //
translated: the samadhi gesture is placed at the lap,🔽turned and placed at the crown.🔽This is the mudra of the Dharmavajra Goddess abiding in the place of Shakyamuni Vairochana and Vajradhatviashvari.

original: 'di snying gar gzhag pa ni 'gro ba 'dul ba dang rdo rje sems ma'i gnas na gnas pa'i chos kyi rdo rje ma'i'o //
analyzed: 'di snying gar gzhag pa ni 'gro ba 'dul ba dang rdo rje sems ma'i gnas na gnas pa'i chos kyi rdo rje ma'i'o //
translated: The Dharma vajra is placed at the heart,🔽turned and placed at the forehead,

original: de nyid yongs su bsgyur nas dpral ba'i phyogs su gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid yongs su bsgyur nas dpral ba'i phyogs su gzhag pa ni /
translated: the samadhi gesture is placed at the lap,🔽turned and placed at the crown.

original: bcom ldan 'das gtsug phud sangs rgyas dang / rdo je rin chen ma'i gnas kyi sangs rgyas dbang bskur ma'i'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gtsug phud sangs rgyas dang / rdo je rin chen ma'i gnas kyi sangs rgyas dbang bskur ma'i'o //
translated: The Blessed One, the Buddha of the topknot, and the Buddha of the abode of the jewel vajra, the Consecrated.

original: de nyid khar bkan nas @66a * //🔽gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid khar bkan nas @66a * // gzhag pa ni /
translated: Placing it on the forehead,

original: padma ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas su padma ting nge 'dzin mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: padma ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas su padma ting nge 'dzin mar 'gyur la /
translated: the lotus samādhi abode becomes the lotus samādhi consort,

original: rdo rje chos ma'i gnas su dam tshig sgrol mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje chos ma'i gnas su dam tshig sgrol mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the abode of the vajra Dharma becomes the pledge Tārā.

original: de nyid bsgyur nas spyi bor gzhag pa ni //
analyzed: de nyid bsgyur nas spyi bor gzhag pa ni //
translated: Turning it and placing it on the crown,

original: padma'i nges pa'i dbang phyug gi gnas su padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi gzungs mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: padma'i nges pa'i dbang phyug gi gnas su padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi gzungs mar 'gyur la /
translated: the abode of the lord of the lotus pledge becomes the dhāraṇī of the lord of the lotus pledge,

original: rdo rje las ma'i gnas su sna tshogs kyi sgor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje las ma'i gnas su sna tshogs kyi sgor 'gyur ro //
translated: and the abode of the vajra action becomes the various doors.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang bcings la //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang bcings la //
translated: Binding the vajra-dhātu mudrā,

original: mchod rten padmo'i tshul du ni //
analyzed: mchod rten padmo'i tshul du ni //
translated: the stūpa in the manner of a lotus,

original: gung mo gnyis ni bcings gyur na //
analyzed: gung mo gnyis ni bcings gyur na //
translated: the two middle fingers bound,

original: sangs rgyas padmo yin par bshad //
analyzed: sangs rgyas padmo yin par bshad //
translated: is explained as the buddha lotus.

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: This is the explanation.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i ming can sh'akya thub pa'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i ming can sh'akya thub pa'i phyag rgya ste /
translated: The mudra of Shakyamuni is called the Vajradhatvi-shvari.

original: gung mo gnyis padma ltar byas pa ni sangs rgyas padma'i gzungs kyi'o //
analyzed: gung mo gnyis padma ltar byas pa ni sangs rgyas padma'i gzungs kyi'o //
translated: The two middle fingers are made like a lotus, which is the mudra of the Buddha Padma-garbha.🔽From that, the two thumbs are vajra,

original: de las mthe bo rdo rje dang // mdzub gnyis ral gri lcags kyur bya //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de las mthe bo rdo rje dang // mdzub gnyis ral gri lcags kyur bya // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: and the two index fingers are sword and iron hook.

original: sangs rgyas padma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya las mthe bong gnyis rdo rjer byas la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas padma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya las mthe bong gnyis rdo rjer byas la /
translated: This means that from the mudra of the Buddha Padma-garbha, the two thumbs are made into vajra,

original: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba ni ral grir bya ba dang / g-yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyur byas pa ni padma rgyal po'i gzungs kyi'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba ni ral grir bya ba dang / g-yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyur byas pa ni padma rgyal po'i gzungs kyi'o //
translated: and the extended right index finger is made into a sword, and the left index finger is made into an iron hook, which is the mudra of Padma-raja-garbha.

original: de las mthe bo bsnol nas kyang //
analyzed: de las mthe bo bsnol nas kyang //
translated: From that, the thumbs are crossed,

original: mdzub mos mdzub mo rab bzung la //
analyzed: mdzub mos mdzub mo rab bzung la //
translated: and the index fingers firmly grasp the index fingers,

original: drangs na rab dga' yin par bshad //
analyzed: drangs na rab dga' yin par bshad //
translated: and when drawn, it is explained as supreme joy.

original: ces bya ba ni padma rgyal po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya de nyid las /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni padma rgyal po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya de nyid las /
translated: This means that from that very mudra of Padma-raja-garbha,

original: mthe bo gnyis rdo rje bcings pa'i tshul gyis bsnol la mdzub mo g-yas pa'i lcags kyus g-yon pa'i logs las mda' 'dren pa'i tshul du byed pa ni padma chags pa'i'o //
analyzed: mthe bo gnyis rdo rje bcings pa'i tshul gyis bsnol la mdzub mo g-yas pa'i lcags kyus g-yon pa'i logs las mda' 'dren pa'i tshul du byed pa ni padma chags pa'i'o //
translated: The two thumbs crossed in the manner of binding a vajra, and the right forefinger in the form of a hook drawing the arrow from the left side is the lotus passion.

original: legs so zhes pa'ang de bzhin te //
analyzed: legs so zhes pa'ang de bzhin te //
translated: The good is also like that.

original: zhes bya ba ni padma chags pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya las ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni padma chags pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya las ;
translated: This is the seal of the lotus passion dhāraṇī.

original: mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo gnyis kyis se gol gtogs pa'i tshul du byed pa ni padmo legs so zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo gnyis kyis se gol gtogs pa'i tshul du byed pa ni padmo legs so zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The two forefingers snapping with the two thumbs is the great seal of the lotus good.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
translated: Having made the firm vajra binding,

original: mthe ba gnyis mnyam ste bcug nas kyang //🔽mdzub gnyis rtse bkug rtse mo ni //
analyzed: mthe ba gnyis mnyam ste bcug nas kyang // mdzub gnyis rtse bkug rtse mo ni //
translated: the two thumbs inserted evenly,🔽the two forefingers bent at the tips,

original: dpral gzhag gung mo padmor bya //
analyzed: dpral gzhag gung mo padmor bya //
translated: the two middle fingers lotus-like at the forehead.🔽 This is the lotus good seal.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bo gnyis bcug nas gung mo gnyis padma ltar byas la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bo gnyis bcug nas gung mo gnyis padma ltar byas la /
translated: From the vajra binding, having inserted the two thumbs, the two middle fingers are made like a lotus.

original: mdzub mo gnyis myu gu ltar bsgreng nas tshigs gsum pa bkug ste /
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis myu gu ltar bsgreng nas tshigs gsum pa bkug ste /
translated: The two forefingers are extended like sprouts, the third joint bent.

original: rtse mo gnyis dpral pa'i phyogs su gzhag pa ni padma khro gnyer gyi gzungs kyi'o //
analyzed: rtse mo gnyis dpral pa'i phyogs su gzhag pa ni padma khro gnyer gyi gzungs kyi'o //
translated: The two tips are placed in the direction of the forehead, which is the mudra of Padma Krodhanisthana.

original: de nyid las ni snying gar yang //
analyzed: de nyid las ni snying gar yang //
translated: From that very mudra, at the heart center,

original: @66b nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang // zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: @66b nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: displaying the mandala of the sun,

original: padmo khro gnyer gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya las /
analyzed: padmo khro gnyer gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya las /
translated: from the mudra of Padma Krodhanisthana,

original: snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni padma nyi ma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'o //🔽de nyid las ni rgyal mtshan bcings //
analyzed: snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni padma nyi ma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'o // de nyid las ni rgyal mtshan bcings //
translated: displaying the mandala of the sun at the heart center, this is the mudra of Padma Suryagarbha.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: From that very mudra, the victory banner is bound,

original: padma nyi ma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya nyid las dpung pa gnyis brkyang la spyi bor gzhag pa ni padma zla ba'i dpal gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: padma nyi ma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya nyid las dpung pa gnyis brkyang la spyi bor gzhag pa ni padma zla ba'i dpal gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: from the very mudra of Padma Suryagarbha, extend both arms and place them on the crown of the head; this is the mudra of Padma Candrashri.

original: ltag par rab tu brkyang par bya //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ltag par rab tu brkyang par bya // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Extend it to the nape of the neck,

original: de nyid mgo bo'i rgyab tu brkyang nas sor mo'i rtse mo rnams so sor gzhag pa ni zhal bcu gcig pa'i gzungs kyi'o //
analyzed: de nyid mgo bo'i rgyab tu brkyang nas sor mo'i rtse mo rnams so sor gzhag pa ni zhal bcu gcig pa'i gzungs kyi'o //
translated: from that very mudra, extend it to the back of the head and place the tips of the fingers separately; this is the mudra of Ekadasha-mukhi.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa dam bcas la /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa dam bcas la /
translated: The samadhi called Vajra-binding pledge is as follows:🔽The two tips of the index fingers are bent into a lotus.

original: mdzub gnyis rtse mo padmor dgug / ces bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang la cung zad bskum nas /
analyzed: mdzub gnyis rtse mo padmor dgug / ces bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang la cung zad bskum nas /
translated: This means that from the vajra-binding, extend the two index fingers and bend them slightly,

original: phan tshun gdong sbyar nas gzhag pa 'di ni padma sgrol ma'i gzungs kyi'o //
analyzed: phan tshun gdong sbyar nas gzhag pa 'di ni padma sgrol ma'i gzungs kyi'o //
translated: and place them with the backs of the fingers touching each other. This is the mudra of Padma Tārā.

original: de bzhin padmo ral gri ste //
analyzed: de bzhin padmo ral gri ste //
translated: Likewise, the lotus sword

original: mdzub mo padmor byas pa sbyar //
analyzed: mdzub mo padmor byas pa sbyar //
translated: is the index fingers made into a lotus and joined.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This means that

original: padma sgrol ma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun gdong sbyar la /
analyzed: padma sgrol ma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun gdong sbyar la /
translated: from the mudra of Padma Tārā, the two index fingers touch each other back to back,

original: tshigs gsum pa gnyis cung zad bkug pa ni padma ral gri ste padma rnon po'i gzungs kyi'o //
analyzed: tshigs gsum pa gnyis cung zad bkug pa ni padma ral gri ste padma rnon po'i gzungs kyi'o //
translated: and the two third joints are slightly bent. This is the mudra of Padma Tīkṣṇa.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
translated: The samadhi called Vajra-binding pledge is as follows:🔽The left thumb is inserted inside,

original: mthe bo g-yon pa nang du gzhug / de steng mthe bo tho bar bsgreng //
analyzed: mthe bo g-yon pa nang du gzhug / de steng mthe bo tho bar bsgreng //
translated: and the right thumb is raised like a hammer,

original: sor mo kun kyang bad mthe'u chung //
analyzed: sor mo kun kyang bad mthe'u chung //
translated: and all the fingers are bent except for the little fingers.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This means that🔽from the vajra-binding, insert the left thumb inside,

original: rdo rje bsdams pa las g-yon pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug la /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa las g-yon pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug la /
translated: and

original: g-yas pa'i mthe bo bsgreng la mthe'u chung gnyis phan tshun lto sbyar nas padma ltar byas te /
analyzed: g-yas pa'i mthe bo bsgreng la mthe'u chung gnyis phan tshun lto sbyar nas padma ltar byas te /
translated: Raise the right thumb, and cross the two little fingers, making them like the center of a lotus.

original: sor mo lhag ma rnams steng du brkyang bar byas pa 'di ni padma rgyu'i gzungs kyi'o //
analyzed: sor mo lhag ma rnams steng du brkyang bar byas pa 'di ni padma rgyu'i gzungs kyi'o //
translated: The remaining fingers should be extended upward. This is the mudra of Padma-nayaka.

original: de las thams cad bkug nas kyang ;
analyzed: de las thams cad bkug nas kyang ;
translated: From that, having drawn in all,

original: / mthe chung padma lta bur bya //🔽mthe bos g-yas dang sbyor pa yis //
analyzed: / mthe chung padma lta bur bya // mthe bos g-yas dang sbyor pa yis //
translated: the little fingers are made like a lotus.🔽The right thumb is joined,

original: mdzub mos nor bu bsgreng bar bya //
analyzed: mdzub mos nor bu bsgreng bar bya //
translated: and the index finger is extended like a jewel.

original: zhes bya ba ni padma rgyu'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya las /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni padma rgyu'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya las /
translated: This is the mudra of Padma-nayaka.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe'u chung gnyis padmar byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe'u chung gnyis padmar byas la /
translated: The two little fingers of the vajra-binding are made like a lotus,

original: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo mthe bos phreng ba 'dren pa'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni padma bsrung pa'i gzungs kyi'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo mthe bos phreng ba 'dren pa'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni padma bsrung pa'i gzungs kyi'o //
translated: and the right thumb and index finger are like a rosary, in the manner of leading. This is the mudra of Padma-rakṣa.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //🔽mthe'u chung padma lta bur bya //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la // mthe'u chung padma lta bur bya //
translated: Having made the vajra-binding,🔽the little fingers are made like a lotus.

original: mdzub mo bsnyams pa padma'i spyan //
analyzed: mdzub mo bsnyams pa padma'i spyan //
translated: The index fingers are joined, like lotus eyes,

original: rab tu gar byed bzlog par bya //
analyzed: rab tu gar byed bzlog par bya //
translated: and one should dance and turn them around.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the mudra of Padma-nartaka.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe'u chung gnyis padma lta bu dang / mdzub mo gnyis brkyang nas @67a * //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe'u chung gnyis padma lta bu dang / mdzub mo gnyis brkyang nas @67a * //
translated: From the vajra-binding, form the two little fingers like a lotus, and extend the two forefingers.🔽Bend the third joint of the two forefingers, and form the shape of an eye.

original: tshigs gsum pa bkug nas mig lta bur byas te gar byas nas ldog ste /
analyzed: tshigs gsum pa bkug nas mig lta bur byas te gar byas nas ldog ste /
translated: Dance, and reverse.

original: dpral pa'i phyogs su mig gi tshul du gzhag pa 'di ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gzungs kyi'o //
analyzed: dpral pa'i phyogs su mig gi tshul du gzhag pa 'di ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gzungs kyi'o //
translated: Place [the mudra] on the forehead in the manner of an eye. This is the mudra of Padmanarteshvara.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa dam bya la //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa dam bya la //
translated: Make the vajra-binding,

original: mthe'u chung padma lta bur bya //🔽nang du mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste //
analyzed: mthe'u chung padma lta bur bya // nang du mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste //
translated: and form the two little fingers like a lotus.🔽Bend the two forefingers inward,

original: mthe bo gnyis ni go char bya //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mthe bo gnyis ni go char bya // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: and cover with the two thumbs.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe'u chung gnyis padma ltar byas la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste mthe bong gnyis bkab pa 'di ni padma bsrung pa'i gzungs kyi'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe'u chung gnyis padma ltar byas la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste mthe bong gnyis bkab pa 'di ni padma bsrung pa'i gzungs kyi'o //
translated: This is the mudra of Padmasana.

original: de las mthe ba gnyis mche bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
